tika-vin10t:32: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṃ cuto.
tika-vin10t:83: Nimittaṃ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:109: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t:154: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṃ vā, lataṃ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t:157: Pathaviṃ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṃsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t:158: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:166: Uddharantassa khāṇuṃ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t:167: Thullaccayaṃ tato kumbhiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:169: Paṭhamaṃ pana kumbhiṃ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:170: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṃ vā, saṅkhaliṃ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t:172: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:175: Jātaṃ chindati ce rukkhaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t:181: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṃ, muṭṭhiṃ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t:182: Bhājane vā gataṃ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t:184: Hāraṃ vā pana pāmaṅgaṃ, suttāruḷhaṃ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t:185: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:191: Sakalampi ca taṃ kumbhiṃ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t:193: Sace khipati yaṃ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṃ telakumbhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:194: Taṃ pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ, dhuvaṃ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t:197: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṃ, telaṃ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t:200: Pītaṃ telañca taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, uddharantova dhaṃsito.
tika-vin10t:202: Tattheva bhindato telaṃ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:203: Jhāpentassa abhogaṃ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:214: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t:220: Hatthaṃ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:222: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:228: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t:229: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṃ, sayaṃ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:232: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṃ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:234: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṃ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t:237: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t:240: Sace gaṇhāti taṃ moraṃ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t:241: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:243: Itaraṃ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:244: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t:246: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṃ taṃ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t:247: Pāde thullaccayaṃ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:255: Chijjamānaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:261: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t:262: Taṃ taṃ tassa bhave ṭhānaṃ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:268: Saṃharitvā sace vaṃse, ṭhapitaṃ hoti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:269: Katvā punorato bhogaṃ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t:272: Na tu cīvaravaṃso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t:275: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṃ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t:280: Uddhaṃ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṃ pana vaṃsato;
tika-vin10t:283: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:290: Saṃharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:292: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṃ, laggitaṃ hoti bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:293: Sikkāto taṃ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t:296: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:305: Bhittiṃ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:307: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṃ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t:308: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:310: Piṇḍiṃ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:318: Vatthu taṃ chindato pupphaṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ vade.
tika-vin10t:321: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṃ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t:327: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t:330: Cāletvā udakaṃ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:335: Accuggatassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ, jalato sakalaṃ jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:341: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:342: Na tassa udakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:344: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:347: Tassevaṃ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t:353: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t:357: Ninne macchavisaṃ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t:359: Pacchā macchavisaṃ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:365: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t:366: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:369: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t:381: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:389: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t:390: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṃ tassā dvidhā mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:393: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:396: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:409: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:415: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṃ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:416: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:419: Acāventova taṃ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t:422: Sayameva ca gacchantiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:425: Yānaṃ nāma ratho vayhaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t:432: Yānaṃ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t:443: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:444: Thullaccayaṃ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t:453: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:455: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:458: Phusitvā yaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhūmiṃ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t:468: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t:471: Khandhaṃ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:482: Parājeti paraṃ dhammaṃ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t:485: Parajjati sayaṃ dhammaṃ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:496: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t:498: Yasmiṃ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:499: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:501: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t:513: Tañca kho sāmikānaṃ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t:516: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:520: Rajjuṃ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṃ pāteti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:522: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:523: Ādo thullaccayaṃ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:527: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:530: Tiṇaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, lataṃ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:534: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t:539: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:543: Citte cintento vā aññaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t:561: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṃ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:563: Vāpiyaṃ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t:569: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t:576: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t:577: Ābhataṃ tāva taṃ sabbaṃ, tesameva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:579: Tasmā taṃ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:582: Yadā niyyāditaṃ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:586: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṃ viya na hotidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:589: Aggiṃ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t:592: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t:596: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:608: Nivatthaṃ pana vatthaṃ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t:609: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṃ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t:611: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:620: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t:623: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t:624: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t:626: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṃ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t:632: ‘‘Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā’’ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:645: ‘‘Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṃ kiṃ nu dassati’’;
tika-vin10t:648: Tasmiṃ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṃ;
tika-vin10t:655: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t:656: Dhuvaṃ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t:658: Taṃ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:659: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:661: Patitvā bhūmiyaṃ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṃ pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:664: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t:668: Sārato taṃ gahetabbaṃ, yuttaṃ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t:670: Sayaṃ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:671: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṃ taṃ, gataṃ nāsakaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:673: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:676: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṃ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:679: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t:682: Sace pājeti taṃ yānaṃ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṃ;
tika-vin10t:685: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṃ suṅkaṃ, gantuṃ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:689: Antojātaṃ dhanakkītaṃ, dinnaṃ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:692: Bhujissaṃ vā harantassa, mānusaṃ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:707: Saṇikaṃ pana gacchantaṃ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t:708: Sīghaṃ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t:710: Palāyitvā sace aññaṃ, gāmaṃ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t:711: Gataṃ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t:724: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:726: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṃ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t:730: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:740: Ṭhānaṃ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṃ sakalaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:743: Tasmā tesaṃ vasā hatthiṃ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t:745: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t:748: Nipannassa gajassekaṃ, ṭhānaṃ taṃ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:749: Tasmiṃ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:756: Garukaṃ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:772: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṃ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:775: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t:780: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:781: Mārentassa paraṃ ghāto, ayaṃ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t:783: ‘‘Evaṃ tvaṃ paharitvā taṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:793: Ayaṃ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t:795: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t:801: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:802: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t:807: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:810: Evaṃ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t:811: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t:813: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t:816: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so ‘‘vatthū’’ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t:817: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṃ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t:819: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṃ taṃ sattamāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:825: ‘‘Yaṃ mārehī’’ti āṇatto, aññaṃ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t:834: Āṇatto ‘‘ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī’’ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:835: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t:843: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:848: ‘‘Imaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ veriṃ, mārehī’’ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t:849: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t:851: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t:854: ‘‘Vaneyevā’’ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t:861: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:866: Iti vutto sace veriṃ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t:873: Māreti naṃ nisinnaṃ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:876: Vutto māreti gacchantaṃ, nisinnaṃ vā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-vin10t:879: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t:881: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:884: ‘‘Mārehī’’ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:885: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t:890: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ, kāḷaṃ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t:893: Sopi yaṃ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:897: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:900: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:902: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṃ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:905: ‘‘Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū’’ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t:906: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t:911: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṃ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t:917: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t:918: Patitaṃ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t:920: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t:921: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṃ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:929: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:933: Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t:938: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṃ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t:941: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t:944: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t:947: Yo pāsaṃ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t:948: Taṃ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t:950: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:953: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṃ sayaṃkataṃ;
tika-vin10t:954: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:956: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:957: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṃ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t:959: Ropentassa ca sūlaṃ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:984: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t:1002: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:1006: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t:1020: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t:1051: Sukkaṃ yadi vimoceti, garukaṃ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t:1054: Thullaccayaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ, sace sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1057: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, yadi sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1059: Vatthiṃ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1081: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:1087: Aṅgulīnaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t:1088: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t:1118: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṃ, vāditaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1121: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t:1143: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṃ, itthīnaṃ garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:1145: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:1165: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1167: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t:1168: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1174: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṃ vijānanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1181: Vīmaṃsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:1196: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1198: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1224: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṃ ekakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1230: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṃ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t:1235: ‘‘Goṇaṃ demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1244: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1250: Pharasuṃ vāpi vāsiṃ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1251: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ rukkhaṃ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t:1256: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṃ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t:1257: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t:1260: Tathā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṃ kuṭiṃ.
tika-vin10t:1265: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṃ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1272: Adesetvā sace vatthuṃ, yo kareyya mahallakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1286: Suddhaṃ vā yadi vāsuddhaṃ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t:1300: Taṃ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1305: Atha sopi ‘‘mayā diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ vā’’ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:1306: Tesaṃ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:1308: Dūtaṃ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṃ vā pana sāsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1318: Tathā kammaṃ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1333: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:1337: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṃ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t:1340: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, ‘‘bhedatthaṃ mā parakkama’’;
tika-vin10t:1343: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1347: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1350: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṃ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t:1353: Dūtaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1356: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1364: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t:1371: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1401: Kamme kariyamāne taṃ, accajaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:1403: Cuṇṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ phalaṃ pupphaṃ, veḷuṃ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1415: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1418: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṃ, dātabbaṃ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t:1430: Gilānānaṃ manussānaṃ, dātabbaṃ tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1433: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t:1446: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṃ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1448: Sakiṃ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṃ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t:1449: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1452: Ropane paribhogatthaṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1454: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṃ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t:1458: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1460: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṃ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t:1467: Siñcane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1475: Ganthimaṃ gopphimaṃ nāma, vedhimaṃ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t:1478: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1487: Veṭhimaṃ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṃ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1496: Sabbametaṃ sayaṃ kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1500: Aññehi pūritaṃ puppha-paṭaṃ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t:1503: Kharapattamayaṃ mālaṃ, sabbaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1509: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṃ, pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1512: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1521: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṃ kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1529: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t:1532: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t:1535: Sace bhesajjametesaṃ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t:1536: Yācantipi ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1538: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1539: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā vā, ‘‘dassanti puna me ime’’.
tika-vin10t:1541: Etesaṃ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1545: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṃ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1547: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t:1550: Atha tesampi puttānaṃ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:1562: Jalaṃ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1564: Dātabbaṃ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1565: Attano udakaṃ tesaṃ, suttaṃ vā deti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1574: Ṭhapetvā taṃ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1577: Satthunā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t:1583: Pañcannaṃ sahadhammīnaṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1618: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t:1624: Chedaṃ vā vattabhedaṃ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t:1626: Parivāso visodhetuṃ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t:1627: Nikkhipitvāna taṃ vattaṃ, vatthabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1629: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t:1630: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṃ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:1642: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t:1647: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1648: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t:1650: Ārocetvāva taṃ vattaṃ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t:1660: Ekaccaṃ sakalaṃ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t:1674: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:1675: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṃ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t:1681: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t:1686: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t:1698: Nikkhipe santike tesaṃ, vattaṃ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t:1710: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṃ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:1723: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1730: Na karoti anāpattiṃ, itthīnaṃ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:1742: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t:1745: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t:1752: Cīvaraṃ chabbidhaṃ vuttaṃ, jātito pana kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1760: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1763: Rajitvā kappiyaṃ binduṃ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1767: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṃ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t:1783: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṃ vā, chinditabbaṃ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t:1787: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t:1804: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t:1807: Paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:1808: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:1837: Gaṇanaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t:1850: Puna paccuddharitvā taṃ, vikappeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:1852: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t:1883: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṃ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t:1892: Dukkaṭaṃ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1910: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1914: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṃ nu, kātabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1917: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1920: Na tassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:1922: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1926: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t:1931: There ca dahare maggaṃ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t:1935: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1938: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1941: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1951: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1959: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṃ, vatthaṃ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t:1963: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṃ dukkaṭadvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1965: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t:1966: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t:1975: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1977: ‘‘Dhovā’’ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṃ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t:1987: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1989: Avuttā paribhuttaṃ vā, aññaṃ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:2008: Aññaṃ pana parikkhāraṃ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:2019: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t:2028: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2029: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṃ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:2039: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2053: Akappiyaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2055: Rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:2056: Atthāya gaṇhituṃ kiñci, dīyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2061: Netvā akappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, itthaṃ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t:2064: Ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā, cetiyaṃ vā karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t:2065: Na ca vaṭṭati taṃ vatthuṃ, sabbesaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2067: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t:2070: Taṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nisedhetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2077: Gahaṇaṃ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:2080: Iccevaṃ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2082: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2086: Bhāgaṃ dethā’’ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t:2095: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṃ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2097: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t:2104: Āharanti ca yaṃ vuttā, sabbesaṃ tamakappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2109: ‘‘Gāvo demā’’ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2113: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2115: Hatthiṃ vā mahisaṃ assaṃ, goṇaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2116: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2118: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:2119: Mūlaṃ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2125: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t:2136: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2146: Anāpatti tulaṃ vāpi, bahuṃ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2153: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2156: Channaṃ orena vassānaṃ, karontassa ca santhataṃ;
tika-vin10t:2160: Kataṃ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:2176: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t:2182: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2191: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2195: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t:2200: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2201: Acchinnaṃ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṃ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t:2220: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t:2227: Suttaṃ vatthaṃ halaṃ phālaṃ, kappiyaṃ evamādikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2230: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2233: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2241: ‘‘Idaṃ ayyassa hotū’’ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:2244: Paṭikkhittepi taṃ vatthuṃ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:2245: Tathā gopāyitabbaṃ taṃ, yathā taṃ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t:2248: Iccevaṃ bhikkhuno vattuṃ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2254: Gahetuṃ aññato laddhaṃ, bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2256: Yaṃ kiñci pana sambhūtaṃ, paccayaṃ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t:2269: Vatthuṃ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṃ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2270: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṃ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2275: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2279: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2285: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2300: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2303: Sakaṃ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t:2304: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṃ, sayaṃ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2309: ‘‘Gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṃ imaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2310: Idaṃ nāma karohī’’ti, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2313: Challiṃ vā pana valliṃ vā, kaṭṭhaṃ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t:2326: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t:2332: ‘‘Idaṃ mamatthi attho me, iminā’’ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t:2338: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t:2343: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṃ sabbaṃ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:2344: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t:2347: Evaṃ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:2350: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ, na gacchanti vikappanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2358: Yaṃ pattaṃ na vikappeti, yaṃ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2373: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:2388: Yaṃ kiñci sodakaṃ pattaṃ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2391: Bhikkhuno sodakaṃ pattaṃ, otāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2394: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2395: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2406: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2413: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2416: Kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t:2422: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā, dhovituṃ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2423: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ patte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2425: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2432: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṃ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2433: Viññāpeyya navaṃ pattaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2438: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t:2439: Apatto nāmayaṃ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:2442: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:2444: Pattaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2447: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṃ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t:2448: Appicchatāya vā pattaṃ, taṃ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2455: Sace so taṃ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:2458: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2459: Attano ñātakādīnaṃ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t:2468: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2475: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṃ, sāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2480: Sayaṃ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2481: Tāpanaṃ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t:2483: Pacchābhattaṃ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2484: Vaṭṭateva ca taṃ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2491: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ;
tika-vin10t:2501: Khīraṃ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2503: ‘‘Yesaṃ kappati maṃsañhi, tesaṃ sappī’’ti kiṃ idaṃ?
tika-vin10t:2513: Telaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā, sappiṃ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t:2515: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2530: Attanā yaṃ kataṃ telaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2546: Vasānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, telaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2554: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṃ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2557: Paṭiggahetuṃ kātuṃ vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2569: Phāṇitaṃ tu purebhattaṃ, gahitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2576: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2579: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2582: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2591: Pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīraṃ, hoti taṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2599: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tu sattāhakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2600: Aruādīni makkhetuṃ, sāyituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2602: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2619: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t:2627: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṃ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t:2640: Sāmaṃ tu cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindantassa taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:2652: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṃ, bhikkhuṃ gaṇhāti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2656: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t:2670: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2687: Vīte nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2698: Sace akappiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t:2704: Dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2718: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2734: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṃ taṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:2742: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2750: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t:2753: Uttariṃ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṃ.
tika-vin10t:2761: Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t:2762: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2770: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:2771: Cīvarassa pavattiṃ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2774: Khippaṃ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:2783: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2789: Cīvaraṃ vā parasseka-mekaṃ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t:2790: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṃ, dve pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:2792: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2795: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2821: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2823: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2851: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t:2859: Dhammaṃ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2864: Dukkaṭaṃ hoti bhikkhusmiṃ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:2867: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t:2868: Bhaṇantaṃ paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2871: Uddesaṃ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t:2880: Tissannaṃ pana rattīnaṃ, uddhaṃ yo pana rattiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2881: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2883: Vatthuṃ yaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, methunassa pahonakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2887: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t:2892: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṃ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t:2907: Anāpatti dirattaṃ vā, tirattaṃ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t:2921: Rattiyaṃ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t:2931: Vinā dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t:2936: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, padādīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:2942: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṃ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:2943: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2946: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2951: Purise sati viññusmiṃ, sayaṃ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t:2954: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t:2962: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhūte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2964: No ce jānāti so vuttaṃ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:2973: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t:2984: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṃ, vadaṃ pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:2992: Vatthuṃ vā pana āpattiṃ, ārocentassa kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2999: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṃ yo akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3000: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3009: Iccevaṃ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3011: ‘‘Imaṃ khaṇa ca okāsaṃ, idha pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t:3012: Imasmiṃ khaṇa okāse’’, vattumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3014: ‘‘Kandaṃ khaṇa kurundaṃ vā, thūṇaṃ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3015: Mūlaṃ khaṇa ca tālaṃ vā’’, evaṃ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3017: ‘‘Imaṃ mūlaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ tālaṃ imaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3018: Khaṇā’’ti niyametvāna, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3021: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3026: Sace patati toyasmiṃ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3029: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t:3030: Rajaṃ patati ce pubbaṃ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t:3035: Vārinā paṭhamaṃ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3036: Taṃ vaṭṭati vikopetuṃ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t:3044: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṃ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3063: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṃ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t:3065: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṃ, gehaṃ chādenti taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:3068: Yattakaṃ tattha tintaṃ tu, tattakaṃ hotyakappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3069: Atintaṃ tattha yaṃ yaṃ tu, taṃ taṃ hoti hi kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3071: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t:3072: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:3077: Tattha laggaṃ rajaṃ saṇhaṃ, aghaṃsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t:3081: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3083: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṃ thambhaṃ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t:3084: Pathaviṃ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3086: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā, khāṇukaṃ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3087: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t:3089: Pāsāṇaṃ yadi vā rukkhaṃ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3090: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:3095: Kaṇṭakaṃ sūcimaṭṭhiṃ vā, khilaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:3096: Ākoṭetuṃ pavesetuṃ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3099: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3102: Samajjato samaṃ kātuṃ, ghaṃsituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3104: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṃ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3105: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t:3108: Aghaṃsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṃ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3110: Sayaṃ dahati ce bhūmiṃ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3113: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṃ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3116: Ṭhapetuṃ bhikkhuno aggiṃ, bhūmiyaṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3119: Aggiṃ upari dārūnaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3120: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṃ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:3126: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3128: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṃ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t:3129: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṃ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3131: Puna taṃ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3145: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t:3149: Vikopentassa taṃ sabbaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3151: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3152: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṃ jalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3154: Udakena vinā cecca, taṃ panuddharituṃ jalā;
tika-vin10t:3155: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṃ.
tika-vin10t:3161: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3164: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3170: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t:3173: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t:3175: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t:3178: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṃ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t:3187: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṃ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3191: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t:3204: Vandākā vāpi aññaṃ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:3206: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṃ, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3210: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t:3212: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t:3213: Ghaṃsitvā pana taṃ tasmā, apanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3222: Sace taṃ makuḷaṃ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3224: Rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:3225: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3230: Pupphaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t:3233: Nāmetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, dātuṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3234: Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3239: Yesaṃ ruhati rukkhānaṃ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3245: ‘‘Rukkhaṃ chinda lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t:3248: ‘‘Ambaṃ jambumpi nimbaṃ vā, chinda bhinduddharā’’ti vā;
tika-vin10t:3251: ‘‘Imaṃ rukkhaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ challiṃ imaṃ lataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3252: Chinda bhindā’’ti vā vattuṃ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3255: Sabbameva kataṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t:3257: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t:3258: Kappiyaṃ karonto pana, dāruṃ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3260: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t:3261: Bhājanena samānattā, taṃ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3269: Kaṭāhaṃ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3270: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṃ taṃ, kāretabbaṃ tu kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3286: Kamme aropite cevaṃ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3305: Vadato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t:3311: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṃ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:3314: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3315: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3317: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t:3318: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3320: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t:3321: Ṭhapetuṃ tattha mañcādiṃ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3324: Mañcādiṃ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3326: Aññassatthāya yaṃ kiñci, santhataṃ yadi saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3327: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3329: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, ‘‘gacchā’’ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t:3335: Santhataṃ bhikkhunā taṃ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3336: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:3347: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t:3357: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṃ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3359: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t:3360: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3362: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t:3363: Tathā katvāpi taṃ sabbaṃ, gantuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3378: Etaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3382: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:3396: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṃ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t:3400: Yo pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ, jānaṃ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t:3404: Yāva taṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3412: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3422: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t:3431: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṃ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3432: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3435: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:3437: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t:3443: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t:3447: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:3466: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3468: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṃ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3472: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3477: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t:3487: Adhiṭṭheyyaṃ tato uddhaṃ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3488: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭaṃ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:3491: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t:3493: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṃ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3499: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t:3503: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3504: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:3506: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṃ, mattikaṃ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t:3512: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t:3519: Khayaṃ vā āvilattaṃ vā, jalaṃ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t:3547: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3563: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṃ bālaṃ, gilānaṃ gamikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3565: Adhamme pana kammasmiṃ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t:3569: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t:3571: Navakānaṃ vasā dvinnaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t:3574: ‘‘Osārehī’’ti vutto vā, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t:3590: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t:3622: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t:3641: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3653: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:3659: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṃ, cīvaraṃ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:3663: Cīvaraṃ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t:3666: Yaṃ vā nivāsituṃ sakkā, yaṃ vā pārupanūpagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3669: Sayaṃ sūciṃ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:3673: Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t:3676: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3678: ‘‘Yamettha cīvare kammaṃ, bhāro sabbaṃ tavā’’ti hi;
tika-vin10t:3679: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṃ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3685: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3698: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṃ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t:3701: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3743: Tathā saṃvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t:3750: Bhojanaṃ pañcadhā vuttaṃ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3762: Aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3778: Bhuñjitabbaṃ sakiṃ tattha, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3780: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3786: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3787: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t:3790: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3793: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṃ.
tika-vin10t:3800: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṃ.
tika-vin10t:3802: Yaṃ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṃ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t:3803: Bhojanaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, hoti aññataraṃ idha.
tika-vin10t:3806: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t:3811: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3812: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t:3817: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṃ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3818: Kāraṇanti na taṃ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t:3823: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t:3830: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā bhuñjataṃ tathā.
tika-vin10t:3839: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṃ, yāguādīsu taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3859: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t:3860: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṃ, bhojanaṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:3865: Yattha khīraṃ rasaṃ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3875: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3882: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3885: Tato ce uttariṃ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:3888: Gahitā pana pūvā’’ti, bhikkhuṃ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t:3891: Gaṇhatopi ca taṃ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3896: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t:3897: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t:3912: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṃsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:3915: Odano tattha sattannaṃ, dhaññānaṃ odano mato;
tika-vin10t:3921: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t:3927: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3930: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṃ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t:3933: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t:3934: Sace odhiṃ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3936: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṃ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t:3937: Odhiṃ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:3943: Odhiṃ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3946: ‘‘Yāguṃ gaṇhatha, yāgu’’nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3949: Taṃ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t:3960: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t:3961: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:3964: Koṭṭetvā denti taṃ cuṇṇaṃ, sattusaṅgahitaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:3966: Bhajjitānaṃ tu vīhīnaṃ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t:3967: Tesaṃ pana ca yaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, taṃ janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3973: Kuṇḍakaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3975: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t:3976: Khajjakaṃ pana suddhaṃ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3979: Yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ, na pavāreti suddhakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3985: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3990: Maṃsaṃ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3994: Nisedhaṃ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3997: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4000: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t:4002: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṃ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t:4003: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4010: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t:4013: Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4014: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4019: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṃ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4029: Pidahanto sakaṃ pattaṃ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4032: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4037: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4040: Samaṃsañhi rasaṃ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṃ vade;
tika-vin10t:4041: Taṃ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4046: Sace maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā, ‘‘gaṇha maṃsarasa’’nti vā;
tika-vin10t:4047: Vadeyyatthi ca maṃsaṃ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4055: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4061: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṃsakarambake;
tika-vin10t:4070: ‘‘Yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhā’’ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t:4071: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t:4073: Mandā yāgu, bahuṃ bhattaṃ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4074: Idaṃ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pana duddasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4076: Rasaṃ bahurase bhatte, khīraṃ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t:4077: Gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4082: Udakaṃ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4083: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tato puna.
tika-vin10t:4085: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:4088: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4089: Ito saṃsarituṃ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:4091: Tena mañcena naṃ saddhiṃ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t:4100: Kappiyaṃ pana kātabbaṃ, na patteyeva kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4101: Pacchiyaṃ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4109: Byañjanaṃ vāpi yaṃ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t:4111: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:4112: Yena taṃ akataṃ yaṃ vā, kātabbaṃ tena taṃ visuṃ.
tika-vin10t:4117: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṃ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4134: Jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t:4136: Dukkaṭaṃ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t:4160: Mūlaṃ kandaṃ muḷālañca, matthakaṃ khandhakaṃ tacaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4161: Pattaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṃ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t:4170: Saṅgahaṃ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṃ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t:4172: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṃ chetvā, yaṃ taṃ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t:4205: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4223: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t:4225: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t:4228: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t:4241: Tathā pupphaṃ karīrassa, pupphaṃ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4261: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4287: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t:4306: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:4307: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4310: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṃ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4313: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4327: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:4328: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4334: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t:4354: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṃ, iti kālattayaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4355: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṃ taṃ taṃ tu kālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4367: Gahitaṃ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṃ pubbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4370: Iti vuttaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4373: Taṃ taṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4385: Viññāpetvā tathā taṃ ce, dukkaṭaṃ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:4400: Yena yena hi viññattaṃ, tasmiṃ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t:4401: Laddhepi pana taṃ laddhaṃ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t:4409: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t:4426: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t:4428: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṃ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t:4431: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t:4435: Dātuṃ vāpi gahetuṃ vā, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4438: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4440: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4441: Sace yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4447: Tena hatthaṃ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṃ pana bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4449: Paṭicchitabbaṃ taṃ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4452: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ sabbaṃ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4453: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṃ, gahetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4456: Kājabhattaṃ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4458: Tiṃsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t:4461: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t:4462: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t:4465: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t:4467: Gahitaṃ tena taṃ sabbaṃ, hotiyeva na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:4470: Gahitaṃ hoti taṃ sabbaṃ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4471: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṃ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4473: Yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4474: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4480: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t:4483: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṃ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t:4491: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t:4494: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṃ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:4501: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4504: Sace rajaṃ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t:4506: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṃ, gahetuṃ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4509: Sāmaṇerassa taṃ datvā, dinnaṃ vā tena taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4510: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4512: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṃ, sarajaṃ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4513: ‘‘Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ tvaṃ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4515: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4516: Rajaṃ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:4519: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t:4521: Patitaṃ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṃ rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4525: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4527: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4528: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4533: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4536: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṃ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4537: Uṇhattā pana taṃ heṭṭhā, gahetuṃ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t:4540: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t:4546: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4548: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṃ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t:4549: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4554: Tasmā taṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t:4555: Yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, gahetuṃ taṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4557: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4558: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4561: Paññāyati hi taṃ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4563: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ pacchā, khāditabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4564: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṃ, malaṃ vaṭṭati khādituṃ.
tika-vin10t:4569: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṃ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t:4570: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:4572: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṃ;
tika-vin10t:4576: Patte patati ce toyaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t:4579: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4581: Sattāhaṃ pana vassante, deve suddhaṃ jalaṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:4582: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṃ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4587: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṃ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t:4588: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṃ, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4594: Sace vadati pacchā taṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:4597: ‘‘Etto pūvampi bhattaṃ vā, kiñci gaṇhā’’ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t:4603: Taṃpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṃ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4612: Patitaṃ hatthato tasmiṃ, na karoti akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4615: Bhuñjitabbaṃ tu taṃ katvā, pattaṃ viya nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4617: Sace yāgukuṭaṃ puṇṇaṃ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t:4618: Bhikkhuṃ paṭiggahāpetuṃ, na sakkoti hi taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4623: Atha vā bhūmiyaṃyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:4624: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4627: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4630: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṃ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t:4636: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4639: Gaṇhitvā puna taṃ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṃ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4641: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṃ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t:4642: Tatheva taṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t:4644: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṃ na taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4645: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4651: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ tu, tasmiṃ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4653: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4657: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4659: Chinditvā ce vatiṃ ucchuṃ, phalaṃ vā deti gaṇhituṃ;
tika-vin10t:4662: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t:4665: Uddhaṃ hatthasataṃ gantvā, sampattaṃ puna taṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4668: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṃ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t:4669: Phalaṃ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4671: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṃ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4672: Phalaṃ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4674: Gahetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, chāyatthaṃ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:4675: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṃ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4680: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4684: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṃ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t:4692: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t:4696: Yāguṃ bhikkhussa taṃ datvā, sayaṃ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t:4704: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4708: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:4719: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t:4720: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:4722: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ yāguṃ, pātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4723: Sace pacati pacchā taṃ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t:4726: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṃ, phalaṃ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4729: Kaṇṭake bandhituṃ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4731: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4732: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṃ, bhasmaṃ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t:4737: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4740: Ucchuṃ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t:4741: ‘‘Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha’’, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:4752: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:4753: Kūpādīsu jalaṃ pātuṃ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4755: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:4756: Sanditvā yadi taṃ gantvā, nadiṃ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4759: Na ñāyati raso tesaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4762: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4768: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t:4770: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṃ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t:4774: Semhaṃ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4776: Yaṃ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:4777: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4818: Udakaṃ dantaponaṃ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t:4819: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṃ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t:4828: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4838: Pamāṇaṃ savane cevaṃ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t:4848: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4857: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t:4863: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:4864: Vattabbaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vuttaṃ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t:4870: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t:4873: Cārittaṃ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t:4882: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṃ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t:4885: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t:4886: Natthi ārocane kiccaṃ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t:4888: Na doso samaye santaṃ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t:4889: Bhikkhuṃ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṃ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t:4894: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:4902: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, ‘‘rogo dāni na me’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4908: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4918: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t:4923: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṃpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t:4924: Evaṃ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4927: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t:4930: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4938: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, sampattaṃ pana passati;
tika-vin10t:4945: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṃ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t:4955: Uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4961: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t:4966: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t:4967: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4970: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:5002: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t:5004: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5010: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5013: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t:5016: Pājentopi sace nāvaṃ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:5017: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṃ kīḷati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5019: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t:5022: Udakaṃ kañjikaṃ vāpi, cikkhallaṃ vāpi vikkhipaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5054: Disvā vā pana taṃ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t:5055: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:5064: Jotiṃ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t:5065: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṃ tu paccayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5067: Sayaṃ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t:5077: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṃ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:5083: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṃ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t:5090: Dukkaṭaṃ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t:5099: Cīvaraṃ yaṃ nivāsetuṃ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t:5103: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:5108: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5109: Ekaṃ vāpi anekaṃ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5114: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṃ, tena saṃsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t:5125: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṃ, nidhetuṃ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t:5134: Yassa kassaci nāmaṃ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5139: ‘‘Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṃ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t:5146: Puna tenapi vattabbaṃ, ‘‘ko te mitto’’ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5151: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṃ, santakaṃ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t:5152: Vissajjehī’’ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:5154: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5158: Yena taṃ vinayaṃ kammaṃ, kataṃ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5210: Dhovato pana pattaṃ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t:5212: Hatthena taṃ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:5213: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5225: Siñcane siñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, paribhoge idaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5227: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t:5235: Vadatā pana taṃ kammaṃ, uccāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5237: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:5243: ‘‘Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t:5244: Kata’’nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t:5254: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t:5256: Evaṃ satampi bhikkhūnaṃ, sahassampi ca tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:5257: Āpajjateva āpattiṃ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t:5269: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṃ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t:5279: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, sesānaṃ hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5287: Muñcitvā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t:5288: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:5290: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṃ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:5291: Pariyesati pattaṃ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5294: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5307: Maggaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ yo, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5309: Gamane saṃvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t:5310: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṃ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:5329: Kammaṃ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t:5335: Tikkhattuṃ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t:5336: ‘‘Mā hevaṃ avacāyasmā’’, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t:5339: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5349: Saṃvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t:5351: Uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t:5355: Dadatopi tathā ekaṃ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t:5357: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṃ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5358: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t:5367: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṃ diṭṭhiṃ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t:5373: Tathā vināsitaṃ jānaṃ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t:5383: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ uttānamevidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5387: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t:5417: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:5422: Evaṃ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t:5423: Tasmiṃ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t:5435: Kuddho deti pahāraṃ ce, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5438: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṃ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t:5439: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5442: Kaṇṇaṃ vā tassa nāsaṃ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5450: Pahāraṃ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5456: Iti vatvā panāyantaṃ, ‘‘gaccha re’’ti ca muggaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5457: Satthaṃ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t:5459: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t:5466: Kāyaṃ vā kāyabaddhaṃ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5469: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5472: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5473: Hatthādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, aṅgaṃ bhijjati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5492: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5499: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṃ, mā eva’’nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t:5505: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t:5508: ‘‘Yaṃ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī’’ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5527: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5528: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t:5534: Ime kammaṃ karontī’’ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:5541: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṃ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t:5543: Etasmiṃ antare kammaṃ, kopetuṃ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t:5546: Adatvā jahite chandaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5547: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5552: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:5559: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṃ datvāna cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5560: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t:5563: Tikapācittiyaṃ dhamma- kamme vuttaṃ tu cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:5586: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:5587: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t:5608: Sace kappiyavatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vāpi akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5615: ‘‘Na vaṭṭatī’’ti vatvā taṃ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t:5618: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5637: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:5639: Atha sambahulā gāmaṃ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t:5642: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5643: Puna āpucchane kiccaṃ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t:5646: Pavisanti sace aññaṃ, pucchitabbaṃ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t:5648: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṃ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t:5649: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t:5651: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t:5652: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5654: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṃ, bhikkhuṃ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t:5660: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5680: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5685: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t:5692: Navaṃ mañcampi pīṭhaṃ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5699: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5705: Uttānaṃ vāpi aṭṭaṃ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5708: Mañcaṃ vā pana pīṭhaṃ vā, tūlonaddhaṃ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t:5714: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t:5722: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:5740: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5745: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t:5748: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:5755: Yo cantaragharaṃ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t:5756: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:5764: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5765: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:5771: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:5788: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5804: Anāpattittano bhattaṃ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t:5805: Tathā aññassa bhattaṃ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t:5807: Yaṃ na dinnaṃ taṃ dāpeti, na dinnaṃ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:5808: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṃ, samaṃ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:5824: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5830: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṃ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t:5832: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5835: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5836: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5838: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t:5843: Ārāmaṃ upacāraṃ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t:5849: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṃ katvā bahuṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5851: Yāguyā viditaṃ katvā, pūvaṃ bhattaṃ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t:5855: Haranti tena saddhiṃ ce, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t:5860: Yaṃ asaṃviditaṃ katvā, ābhataṃ pana taṃ bahi;
tika-vin10t:5863: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5888: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṃ, tato ūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5894: Ubho koṇe samaṃ katvā, sādaraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5898: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5901: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5904: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t:5909: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t:5912: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t:5915: Hatthaṃ vā pana pādaṃ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5922: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṃ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t:5925: Yo anādariyaṃ katvā, olokento tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:5947: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t:5949: Kāyaṃ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5956: Khambhaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5957: Dukkaṭaṃ muninā vuttaṃ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:5962: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t:5980: Yaṃ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5983: Sese thūpīkataṃ sabbaṃ, vaṭṭateva na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:5985: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5986: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5989: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5992: Dinnaṃ ayāvakālittā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5995: Piṇḍapātaṃ sace denti, idaṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5997: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṃ vā, thālakaṃ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6000: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṃ tu sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6004: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vutta-nayaṃ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t:6007: Aññesaṃ attano bhattaṃ, ākiraṃ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t:6011: Catutthe yaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, vuttaṃ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t:6018: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṃ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6022: Viññattiyaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6023: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t:6045: Mukhe ca sakalaṃ hatthaṃ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6046: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṃ katvā, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6048: Vacanaṃ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṃ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t:6052: Vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ce, kathetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6056: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6067: Katvā evaṃ na bhottabbaṃ, saddaṃ ‘‘suru surū’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t:6068: Hatthanillehakaṃ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:6070: Phāṇitaṃ ghanayāguṃ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṃ;
tika-vin10t:6077: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6081: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṃ vāpi thālakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6083: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6091: Chattaṃ yaṃ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t:6100: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṃ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:6103: Dhanuṃ sarena saddhiṃ vā, dhanuṃ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6107: Sace deseti saddhammaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6110: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṃ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6118: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6121: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t:6123: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṃ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6126: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6140: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6143: Pañhaṃ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6148: Gacchato purato pañhaṃ, na vattabbaṃ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t:6151: Saddhiṃ uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6159: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t:6162: Jīvarukkhassa yaṃ mūlaṃ, dissamānaṃ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t:6163: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṃ, sabbaṃ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t:6171: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṃ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6172: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6178: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
tika-vin10t:6219: Chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ, paṭiseveyya yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6220: Hoti pārājikā nāma, samaṇī sā pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:6232: Sarīrakena ce tena, phuseyya bhikkhunī pana.
tika-vin10t:6235: Sarīramassa tena vā, phuṭṭhā pārājikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6243: Avasesena vā tassa, kāyaṃ kāyena attano;
tika-vin10t:6244: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassā, payoge purisassa ca.
tika-vin10t:6250: Avasese ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6253: Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi, gataṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6255: Kelāyati sace bhikkhu, saddhiṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6261: Bhikkhuno methuno rāgo, gehapemampi vā bhave;
tika-vin10t:6262: Tassā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6264: Ubhinnaṃ methune rāge, gehapemepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6267: Yassa yattha manosuddhaṃ, tassa tattha na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:6271: Pacchā dūseti ce neva, hoti bhikkhunidūsako.
tika-vin10t:6274: Niccalo hoti ce bhikkhu, na hotāpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:6276: Bhikkhunī bhikkhunā phuṭṭhā, sace hotipi niccalā;
tika-vin10t:6282: Tassā kriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sati na dissati;
tika-vin10t:6292: Pārājikattaṃ jānanti, saliṅge tu ṭhitāya hi;
tika-vin10t:6295: Dhure nikkhittamattasmiṃ, sā ca pārājikā siyā;
tika-vin10t:6299: Viseso tatra pācitti, idha pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6303: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko ca so tassā, diṭṭhiyā gahaṇena taṃ.
tika-vin10t:6305: Anuvatteyya yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī sā visumpi ca;
tika-vin10t:6308: Acajantīva taṃ vatthuṃ, gahetvā yadi tiṭṭhati;
tika-vin10t:6312: Puna appaṭisandheyā, dvidhā bhinnā silā viya.
tika-vin10t:6327: Sallapeyya tathā tattha, ṭhatvā tu purisena vā;
tika-vin10t:6328: Saṅketaṃ vāpi gaccheyya, iccheyyā gamanassa vā.
tika-vin10t:6331: Upasaṃhareyya kāyaṃ vā, hatthapāse ṭhitā pana.
tika-vin10t:6336: Anulomena vā vatthuṃ, paṭilomena vā cutā;
tika-vin10t:6339: Athādito panekaṃ vā, dve vā tīṇipi satta vā;
tika-vin10t:6368: Sakkhiṃ vāpi sahāyaṃ vā, pariyesati dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6369: Pade pade tathā aṭṭaṃ, kātuṃ gacchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:6371: Āroceti sace pubbaṃ, bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6372: Disvā vohārikaṃ tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6374: Āroceti sace pacchā, itaro attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6377: Ārocetitaro pubbaṃ, sace so attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6387: Vinicchaye kate tehi, aṭṭe pana ca niṭṭhite.
tika-vin10t:6392: Dūtaṃ vāpi pahiṇitvā, āgantvāna sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6395: Ārāme pana aññehi, anācāraṃ kataṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:6396: Anodissa paraṃ kiñci, rakkhaṃ yācati tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6398: Yāya kiñci avuttāva, dhammaṭṭhā sayameva tu;
tika-vin10t:6399: Sutvā taṃ aññato aṭṭaṃ, niṭṭhāpenti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:6405: Jānantī bhikkhunī coriṃ, vajjhaṃ viditameva yā;
tika-vin10t:6417: Vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā coriṃ, ṭhapetvā kappamevidaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6420: Sammannati ca sīmaṃ vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6421: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi ca dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6424: Gaṇo ācarinī ceva, na ca muccati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6427: Kappaṃ vā apaloketvā, tassā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:6434: Ohīyeyya gaṇamhā vā, rattiṃ vippavaseyya vā.
tika-vin10t:6439: Nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6448: Nikkhamitvā sace pacchā, sakaṃ gāmaṃ visantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6449: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, vaticchiddena vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:6452: Kappiyanti paviṭṭhattā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6454: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihārassa, bhūmi tāsaṃ tu kappiyā;
tika-vin10t:6460: Yaṃ kiñci sakagāmaṃ vā, paragāmampi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:6464: Pāraṃ gacchati yā tīraṃ, tassā samaṇiyā pana.
tika-vin10t:6475: Nhāyituṃ pivituṃ vāpi, otiṇṇātha nadiṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6481: Setunā upagantvā vā, yānākāsehi vā sace;
tika-vin10t:6482: Yāti uttaraṇe kāle, padasā garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:6487: Piṭṭhiyaṃ vā nisīditvā, khandhe vā uttarantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6497: Na doso dutiyā pāsaṃ, uṭṭheti aruṇaṃ sace.
tika-vin10t:6500: Gāmato bahi nikkhamma, tassā dutiyikāya tu.
tika-vin10t:6520: Dvinnaṃ maggaṃ gacchantīnaṃ, ekā gantuṃ no sakkoti;
tika-vin10t:6524: Hoti tassāpi āpatti, saussāhā na hoti ce.
tika-vin10t:6526: Gacchantīsu tathā dvīsu, purimā yāti ekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6527: Aññaṃ pana sace maggaṃ, pacchimāpi ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:6538: Pakkantā vāpi vibbhantā, yātā petānaṃ lokaṃ vā;
tika-vin10t:6539: Pakkhasaṅkantā vā naṭṭhā, saddhiṃ yātā sā ce hoti.
tika-vin10t:6545: Agāmake araññe tu, gaṇā ohīyanaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6548: Cattāropi ca saṅghādi-sesā tassā na vijjare.
tika-vin10t:6555: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi, honti thullaccayā duve.
tika-vin10t:6560: Pucchitvā kārakaṃ saṅghaṃ, chandaṃ datvā gaṇassa vā;
tika-vin10t:6561: Vatte vā pana vattantiṃ, asante kārakepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6563: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ukkhittaṃ, yā osāreti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6585: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, sabbatthāpi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6588: ‘‘Avassuto na cāya’’nti, ñatvā gaṇhati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6606: ‘‘Nāvassuto’’ti ñatvā vā, kupitā vā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:6607: Kulānuddayatā vāpi, uyyojeti ca yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6617: Navame dasame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6622: Yāvatatiyakā aṭṭha, cattāri ca ito tato.
tika-vin10t:6639: Akāle cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, dinnaṃ kālepi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:6643: Bhājāpeyya ca yā tassā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6645: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ yaṃ, taṃ tu nissaggiyaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:6648: Katvā vinayakammaṃ tu, paṭiladdhampi taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6649: Tassa cāyamadhippāyo, sevituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6662: Itaresu ca vatthūnaṃ, payogassa vasā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6667: Tāya vā dīyamānaṃ tu, tassā vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6677: Tasmiṃ taññeva vā aññaṃ, aññenatthepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6684: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā pubbaṃ, pacchā aññaṃ cetāpeyya;
tika-vin10t:6685: Evaṃ saññāyaññaṃ dhaññaṃ, mayhaṃ ānetvā detīti.
tika-vin10t:6688: Lābhe nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tena caññena vābhataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6697: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, lābhe, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:6707: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6718: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:6732: Tato ce uttariṃ yaṃ tu, cetāpeti hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6746: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi khādati;
tika-vin10t:6749: Dve tayo bhaṇḍike saddhiṃ, saṅkhāditvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6750: Ajjhoharati yā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6752: Bhinditvā tattha ekekaṃ, miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6761: Ekā miñjā palaṇḍussa, bhañjanassa duve siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:6774: Na doso sati ābādhe, lomake saṃharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6781: Gaṇḍaṃ tattha vaṇaṃ vāpi, na doso paharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6792: Pavesāpeti vā tasmiṃ, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6804: Catunnaṃ vāpi tissannaṃ, ekapabbampi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6817: Bhuñjato pana bhikkhussa, pānīyaṃ vā vidhūpanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6827: Khādato khādanaṃ vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6829: Na doso deti dāpeti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
