tika-vin10t:6833: Viññatvā āmakaṃ dhaññaṃ, bhajjitvā yadi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6834: Koṭṭetvā ca pacitvā ca, pācitti paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:6836: Na kevalaṃ tu dhaññānaṃ, gahaṇeyeva dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6837: Haraṇepi ca dhaññānaṃ, tathā sukkhāpane pana.
tika-vin10t:6846: Viññatvā vā sayaṃ tasmā, bhajjanādīni aññato.
tika-vin10t:6849: Kārāpetvāpi katvā vā, ajjhoharati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6854: Bhajjanādīni katvā vā, kārāpetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:6857: Viññattiyā panaññāya, laddhaṃ tāya sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6864: Ñātakānampi dhaññaṃ tu, āmakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6870: Uccāraṃ vāpi passāvaṃ, saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6871: Chaḍḍeyya vā tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:6873: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, pākārepi ayaṃ nayo;
tika-vin10t:6882: Sabbattha pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6883: Avalañjepi vā ṭhāne, oloketvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:6889: Khette vā nāḷikerādi-ārāme vāpi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6892: Tāni cattāri vatthūni, sace chaḍḍeti vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6895: Bhuñjamānā nisīditvā, khette tu harite tathā;
tika-vin10t:6896: Ucchuādīni khādantī, gacchantī pana tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6898: Chaḍḍeti yadi ucchiṭṭhaṃ, udakaṃ calakāni vā;
tika-vin10t:6899: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6905: Na uṭṭhetaṅkuraṃ yāva, sabbesaṃ tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6907: Lāyitampi manussānaṃ, khettaṃ rakkhati ce puna;
tika-vin10t:6910: Na doso chaḍḍite khette, sabbaṃ chaḍḍentiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6914: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6921: Suṇāti tesaṃ gītampi, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:6923: Aññasmimpi disābhāge, naccaṃ passati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:6924: Suṇāti aññato gītaṃ, visuṃ pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:6927: Naccituṃ gāyituṃ neva, sayaṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6929: ‘‘Aññaṃ naccāti vādehi’’, iti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6932: Tassā pācitti sabbattha, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6936: Ārāmeyeva ṭhatvā vā, yā passati suṇāti vā.
tika-vin10t:6938: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, āgantvā ca payojitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6939: Gantvā passantiyā vāpi, tathārūpā hi kāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:6941: Passantiyā tathā maggaṃ, naccaṃ paṭipathepi ca;
tika-vin10t:6950: Santiṭṭhati sace saddhiṃ, purisena ca bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6952: Tassā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, saddhiṃ vā sallapantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6955: Hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā vā, purisassa sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6958: Santiṭṭhati ca yā tassā, dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6959: Anāpatti sace koci, dutiyā viññu vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6966: Adhikaṃ itaraṃ sabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6976: Atikkameti yā, hoti, dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pade;
tika-vin10t:6977: Dutiye ca pade tassā, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t:6993: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ tulyaṃ, aṭṭhame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7011: Dvīsu tesu panekekaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu karontiyā.
tika-vin10t:7027: Dutiye pana vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7032: Anantarāya taṃ pacchā, yā na sibbeyya bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:7037: Pacchā sibbati pācitti, nikkhipitvā dhuraṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:7050: Ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā, pañca pañcasu dīpitā;
tika-vin10t:7070: Yā hi bhikkhuni saṅghassa, labhitabbaṃ tu cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:7073: Gaṇassāpi ca ekissā, lābhe āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7096: Gaṇanāya vasenettha, cīvarānaṃ tu tā pana;
tika-vin10t:7107: Ubhosu kaṅkhitāya vā, avoca dukkaṭaṃ jino.
tika-vin10t:7125: Sesaṃ pana asesena, sattamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7130: Ekāya tu nipannāya, aparā vā nipajjatu;
tika-vin10t:7131: Nipajjeyyuṃ saheva dve, dvinnaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7134: Ekāya ca nipannāya, sace ekā nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:7136: Ubho vāpi nisīdanti, samaṃ, ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7143: Nipajjanti saheva dve, tāsaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7144: Ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ dvinnaṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7161: Na ca aphāsukāmāya, āpucchā purato pana;
tika-vin10t:7179: Sayaṃ upassayā tamhā, nikkaḍḍhati sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7182: Taṃ nikkaḍḍhantiyā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7197: Chaṭṭhe panidha vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7207: Na doso saha satthena, khemaṭṭhānāpadāsu vā;
tika-vin10t:7211: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, anuttānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:7216: Katvā ca dhuranikkhepaṃ, pacchā gacchantiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7219: Chasu vattabbamevatthi, kinnu nāmidha taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7221: Tīṇi gantvā ca teneva, paccāgantuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7238: Niddiṭṭhaṃ muninā tāsaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade;
tika-vin10t:7242: Gantvā passanti ce taṃ taṃ, pāṭekkāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7245: Bhikkhussa pana sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7251: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā, māṇanātītaṃ vāḷūpetaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7263: Channaṃ aññataraṃ suttaṃ, yadi kantati bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:7264: Yattakaṃ añchitaṃ hatthā, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
tika-vin10t:7269: Na doso kantitaṃ suttaṃ, puna kantantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7273: Koṭṭanaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ tu, ādiṃ katvāna dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7280: Kiñci kammaṃ akāretvā, kiñci kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7282: Saṅghassa yāgupāne vā, saṅghabhattepi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7285: Attano ca anāpatti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7290: Tathā idha panekāhaṃ, parihāro na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:7297: Gihīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, dantaponodakaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7299: Ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ aññaṃ, aññesaṃ tu dadāti yā;
tika-vin10t:7303: Yā na deti ca dāpeti, nikkhamitvāpi dentiyā.
tika-vin10t:7305: Deti bāhiralepaṃ vā, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7310: Divase tu catutthe taṃ, dhovitvā puna cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:7315: Tassā nissajjite tasmiṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7316: Utunīnaṃ abhāve tu, aññāsaṃ puna pariyaye.
tika-vin10t:7325: Attano gāmato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7341: Pariyāpuṇeyya ce kiñci, yassa kassaci santike;
tika-vin10t:7344: Lekhe pana anāpatti, dhāraṇāya ca guttiyā;
tika-vin10t:7345: Parittesu ca sabbesu, tathā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7348: Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ, navamena samaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7360: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:7363: Jātakaṅkhāya vā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7366: Tā sannipatitā yattha, tāsaṃ gacchati santikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7375: Akkoseyya ca yā bhikkhuṃ, paribhāseyya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7384: Yā saṅghaṃ paribhāseyya, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7385: Ekaṃ sambahulā vāpi, tatheva itarāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7391: Nimantitāpi vā sace, pavāritāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7395: Yā cajjhoharaṇatthāya, yaṃ kiñci pana āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7397: Paṭiggaṇhāti ce tassā, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7408: Kālikāni ca tīṇeva, paccaye sati bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:7412: Nimantitā anāpucchā, sāmiṃ bhuñjati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:7414: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, akāretvāpi vā yadi;
tika-vin10t:7415: Paribhuñjati yā tassā, pācitti kriyato siyā.
tika-vin10t:7421: Santaṃ bhāsantiyā dosaṃ, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7426: Na vasati sace maggo, akhemo vā sace siyā.
tika-vin10t:7428: Ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma, āvāso pana tattha hi;
tika-vin10t:7431: Pakkantā pakkhasaṅkantā, vibbhantā vā matāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7446: Pariyesitvāpi vā bhikkhuṃ, na doso alabhantiyā;
tika-vin10t:7458: Iccevaṃ pana nikkhitte, dhure pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7467: Pasākhe pana sañjātaṃ, gaṇḍaṃ rucitameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7468: Anāpucchāva saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ ekena ekikā.
tika-vin10t:7471: Katesu dukkaṭāniccha, tassā pācittiyo cha ca.
tika-vin10t:7473: ‘‘Yamettha atthi kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ karohi’’ti;
tika-vin10t:7474: Āṇāpeti sace evaṃ, so ca sabbaṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:7476: Ekāya pana vācāya, dukkaṭāni panaccha ca;
tika-vin10t:7479: Bhedanādīsu ekaṃ sā, āṇāpeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:7480: So karoti ca sabbāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7482: Āpucchitvāpi vā viññuṃ, gahetvā dutiyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7494: Tathā gabbhinisaññāya, na ca gabbhiniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:7503: Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7508: Dve vassāni siyāpatti, vuṭṭhāpeyya sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7513: Chasu sikkhitasikkhaṃ yā, dve vassāni akhaṇḍato;
tika-vin10t:7516: Imā hi cha ca sikkhāyo, saṭṭhivassāpi ce pana;
tika-vin10t:7517: Pabbajjāya padātabbā, adatvā na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:7520: Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ, idha saṅghena sammataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7527: Paṭhamena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, catutthaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7534: Asesena ca sesaṃ tu, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7538: Sattamampi tathā sabbaṃ, catutthena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7542: Vuttaṃ tena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ na visesatā.
tika-vin10t:7545: Dve vassāni ca yā kāci, vuṭṭhāpitapavattiniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7558: Vuṭṭhāpetvā tu yā kāci, bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7559: Taṃ gahetvā na gaccheyya, na caññaṃ āṇāpeyya ce.
tika-vin10t:7572: Yā mahūpapadā dve tu, sikkhamānā panādito;
tika-vin10t:7575: Sace gihigatā honti, na ca vā purisaṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:7579: Vattabbā panubhopetā, evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7584: Yā aṭṭhārasavassā tu, tato paṭṭhāya sā pana;
tika-vin10t:7601: Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthaṃ pañcamampi ca;
tika-vin10t:7612: Laddhe ca cīvare pacchā, asante antarāyike;
tika-vin10t:7629: Mātarā pitarā vātha, nānuññātaṃ tu sāminā;
tika-vin10t:7633: Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ tu, bhikkhunīhi, na bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:7649: Dvādase terase vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7658: Divasampi ca dhāreti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7661: Chattameva ca dhārentī, yadi gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7667: Puna dhārentiyā tassā, hoti pācittiyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:7683: Yā ca dhāreyya saṅghāṇiṃ, yaṃ kiñcipi kaṭūpiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7696: Dhāreti pana yaṃ kiñci, sace sīsūpagādisu;
tika-vin10t:7697: Tassā tassa ca vatthussa, gaṇanāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7699: Ābādhapaccayā doso, kiñci dhārentiyā na ca;
tika-vin10t:7709: Sesaṃ tu tatiyeneva, sadisaṃ sabbathā mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7732: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7737: Vinaye ca katokāsaṃ, suttaṃ pucchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:7746: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:7749: Yassā saṃkaccikaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acchinnaṃ vāpi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:7759: Agilānā sace sappiṃ, laddhaṃ viññattiyā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7776: Bhuñjantiyā tu viññatvā, aṭṭhasupi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7780: Sekhiyā pana ye dhammā, uddiṭṭhā pañcasattati;
tika-vin10t:7794: Suṇanti vinaye hi te ye hite;
tika-vin10t:7824: Pabbājeti sace taṃ so, sayamevāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7826: Sāmaṇeropi vattabbo, daharo natthi tattha ce;
tika-vin10t:7832: Purisaṃ bhikkhuto añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7833: Itthiṃ bhikkhunito añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7835: Sāmaṇeropi vā dātuṃ, sāmaṇerīpi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7838: Sayameva ca yaṃ kiñci, pabbājentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:7842: Sarīre pīḷakā vāpi, kacchu vā tassa honti ce.
tika-vin10t:7844: Mātā yathā niyaṃputtaṃ, na jigucchati sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:7859: Atha hatthepi vā tassa, adatvā sayameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:7862: Nivāseti anāṇatto, so pārupati vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7863: Apanetvā tato sabbaṃ, puna dātabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t:7865: Bhikkhunā tu sahatthena, tathā āṇattiyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7866: Dinnaṃ vaṭṭati kāsāvaṃ, nādinnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7868: Tasseva santakaṃ vāpi, kā kathā attasantake;
tika-vin10t:7874: Sace ekapadaṃ vāpi, deti ekakkharampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7875: Paṭipāṭiṃ virajjhitvā, gahitaṃ ce na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7877: Tikkhattuṃ yadi vā deti, buddhaṃ saraṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7878: Tathā sesesu cevampi, na dinnāneva honti hi.
tika-vin10t:7884: Na hoti pana pabbajjā, ubhatosuddhiyā vinā.
tika-vin10t:7900: Dātabbaṃ tassa kālena, sace yāgu bhavissati.
tika-vin10t:7905: Cīvare yāni vattāni, vuttāni hi mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:7926: Ekekassa ubhinnaṃ vā, nālaye sati bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:7932: Yācitassa na dosova, vasituṃ nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7963: Tathā kaṇṇikakeso vā, thūlakesopi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7977: Tathā ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo vā, pūtikaṇṇopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7986: Niccavissavanāso vā, yo vā pana mahāmukho;
tika-vin10t:7999: Sukhumova ṭhito, taṃ ce, pabbājetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8016: Vikaṭo vāpi paṇho vā, tathā ubbaddhapiṇḍiko.
tika-vin10t:8019: Tathā piṭṭhikapādo vā, mahāpaṇhipi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8021: Vaṅkapādo naro yo vā, gaṇṭhikaṅgulikopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8028: ‘‘Sāmaṇerajja mā khāda, mā bhuñja ca pivā’’ti ca;
tika-vin10t:8037: Yāguṃ vā pana bhattaṃ vā, dassetvā kira bhāsituṃ;
tika-vin10t:8046: Udakaṃ vā pavesetuṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8056: Vāritā yassa pabbajjā, nāsetabboti so mato;
tika-vin10t:8057: Tividhe pana te ñatvā, pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8063: Sayameva ca yo tattha, pabbajitvā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:8067: Yo ca pabbajito hutvā, bhikkhuvassāni gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:8076: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccati’’.
tika-vin10t:8083: Hoti titthiyapakkanto, liṅge tesaṃ tu nissite.
tika-vin10t:8091: Morapiñchādikaṃ tesaṃ, liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti vā sace;
tika-vin10t:8092: Sārato ceva vā tesaṃ, pabbajjaṃ laddhimeva vā.
tika-vin10t:8101: Nāgo vāpi supaṇṇo vā, yakkho sakkopi vā idha;
tika-vin10t:8109: Dūsetvā pana so neva, bhikkhunīdūsako siyā.
tika-vin10t:8112: Labhateva ca pabbajjaṃ, sā ca neva parājitā.
tika-vin10t:8116: Karoto dukkaṭaṃ hoti, na kuppati sace kataṃ.
tika-vin10t:8119: Sesesupi ayaṃ ñeyyo, nayo sabbattha viññunā.
tika-vin10t:8125: Apatto tesamosāro, kato ce pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8133: Osāretvā kataṃ kammaṃ, na ca kuppati kappati.
tika-vin10t:8140: Anupubbena sāvetvā, tesaṃ nāmaṃ tu tena ca;
tika-vin10t:8141: Ekato anusāvetvā, katampi ca na kuppati.
tika-vin10t:8155: Nimittena nimittaṃ tu, ghaṭetvā pana sammatā.
tika-vin10t:8158: Baddhā nāma siyā sīmā, sā tisampattisaṃyutā.
tika-vin10t:8161: Iti baddhā tidhā vuttā, abaddhāpi tidhā matā.
tika-vin10t:8166: Jātassare samudde vā, nadiyā vā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8175: Imā dve pana sīmāyo, vaḍḍhanti parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:8182: Tasmā so hatthapāse vā, kātabbo bahi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8185: Ñatvā pamāṇaṃ sodhetvā, sīmaṃ bandheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:8190: Pabbataṃ vanaṃ pāsāṇaṃ, rukkhaṃ maggañca vammikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8193: Tesu tīṇi nimittāni, ādiṃ katvā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8224: Saṅghassa pātimokkho ca, pārisuddhi gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin10t:8230: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca viññunā;
tika-vin10t:8241: Uddisante samappā vā, āgacchanti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:8242: Uddiṭṭhaṃ taṃ suuddiṭṭhaṃ, sāvetabbaṃ tu sesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8245: Pārisuddhi tu kattabbā, mūle tesaṃ, sace bahū.
tika-vin10t:8254: No ce adhiṭṭhaheyyassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8257: Tathā dhammena vaggena, samaggena ca dhammato.
tika-vin10t:8265: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8271: Dhammena pana vaggo hi, katamo so uposatho;
tika-vin10t:8274: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8282: Vagge samagge vaggoti, saññino vimatissa vā;
tika-vin10t:8295: Uposatho na kātabbo, dine vā anuposathe.
tika-vin10t:8298: Āvāso vā anāvāso, na gantabbo kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8318: Dasavaggena abbhānaṃ, vinā sabbaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8320: Kammaṃ vīsativaggena, na kattabbaṃ na kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8324: Catuvaggena kattabbe, sesesu ca ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:8330: Katvā pana karontānaṃ, tathā, sesaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8341: Ajjhokāsepi vā vassaṃ, upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8352: Diṭṭhiṃ vā tassa kukkuccaṃ, vinodessāmahanti vā.
tika-vin10t:8358: Dhammassa savanatthāya, gantuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8361: Iccevaṃ katikā pubbaṃ, katā ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8376: Sace pāpuṇituṃ gacchaṃ, na sakkoteva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8378: Vaje satthepi nāvāyaṃ, tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8384: Yena kenantarāyena, vassaṃ nopagato hi yo;
tika-vin10t:8387: Vassaṃ anupagantvā vā, tadaheva ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:8388: Bahiddhā eva sattāhaṃ, upagantvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8390: Vītināmeti ce tassa, purimāpi na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:8391: Paṭissave ca bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8393: Vassaṃ panupagantvā ca, uṭṭhāpetvā na cāruṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8396: Antoyeva ca sattāhaṃ, nivattantassa tassa tu;
tika-vin10t:8397: Anāpattīti ko vādo, vasitvā bahi gacchato.
tika-vin10t:8402: Gahitaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti, chinnavasso na hoti so;
tika-vin10t:8403: Labhateva pavāretuṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8406: Nicchārite ca tikkhattuṃ, vassaṃ upagato siyā.
tika-vin10t:8408: Ādiṃ tu navamiṃ katvā, gantuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8409: Āgacchatu ca pacchā so, mā vā doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8414: Tevācī dvekavācī ca, saṅghe ca gaṇapuggale.
tika-vin10t:8416: Etā pana munindena, vuttā nava pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:8420: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā saṅghena, kattabbā hi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:8423: Sayaṃ yāva pavāreyya, tāva ukkuṭikañhi so.
tika-vin10t:8425: Ñattiṃ vatvā pavāreyyuṃ, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8428: Aññamaññaṃ pavāreyyuṃ, vinā ñattiṃ duve janā;
tika-vin10t:8434: Pañca yasmiṃ panāvāse, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8449: Chandaṃ vā pārisuddhiṃ vā, gahetvā vā pavāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8452: Sace so saṅghamappatvā, vibbhameyya mareyya vā;
tika-vin10t:8453: Nāhaṭañceva taṃ sabbaṃ, patvā cevaṃ siyāhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8455: Saṅghaṃ patvā pamatto vā, sutto vā khittacittako;
tika-vin10t:8479: Na ca vaṭṭanti morassa, piñchena parisibbitā.
tika-vin10t:8482: Ajinassa ca cammena, na vaṭṭati parikkhaṭā.
tika-vin10t:8484: Puṭādiṃ apanetvā vā, chinditvā vāpi sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:8487: Sabbāpi pana dhāretuṃ, na ca vaṭṭanti pādukā;
tika-vin10t:8493: Gonakaṃ kuttakaṃ cittaṃ, paṭikaṃ paṭalikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8502: Heṭṭhā akappiye paccatthare sati na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8505: Āsandiṃ pana pallaṅkaṃ, ṭhapetvā tūlikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8506: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, labhate gihisantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8516: Saṅghassa santakaṃ gehaṃ, santakaṃ bhikkhunopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8522: Sā hi sammutikā nāma, yā hi saṅghena sammatā;
tika-vin10t:8538: Ettha pakkañca vutthañca, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8546: Bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ, hatthato ca paṭiggaho;
tika-vin10t:8547: Tesañca sannidhi anto- vuttaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8549: Bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā, santakaṃ saṅghikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:8550: Antovutthañca pakkañca, ubhinnaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8556: Pakkaṃ taṃ pana sattāhaṃ, vaṭṭateva nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8568: Honti dosakarā bhuttā, abhuttaṃ tatiyampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8570: Ambaṃ jambu ca cocañca, mocañca madhu muddikā;
tika-vin10t:8577: Pacchā parissavaṃ katvā, pātuṃ vaṭṭati pānakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8585: Sabbo puppharaso vutto, madhukassa rasaṃ vinā;
tika-vin10t:8629: Kathinassa ca kiṃ mūlaṃ, kiṃ vatthu kā ca bhūmiyo;
tika-vin10t:8632: Mūlamekaṃ, siyā vatthu, tividhaṃ, bhūmiyo cha ca;
tika-vin10t:8635: Saṅgho mūlanti niddiṭṭhaṃ, vatthu hoti ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8636: Khomādīni cha vuttāni, cīvarāni cha bhūmiyo.
tika-vin10t:8641: Dhovanañca vicāro ca, chedanaṃ bandhanampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8648: Savanāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā.
tika-vin10t:8654: Gantvā pana vihāraṃ so, aññaṃ sukhavihārikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8656: Tattha taṃ viharantova, karoti yadi cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8663: Karontasseva naṭṭhaṃ vā, daḍḍhaṃ vā nāsanantikā.
tika-vin10t:8671: Puna vutte ‘‘na sakkomi, dātunti tava cīvaraṃ’’;
tika-vin10t:8687: Tayopi kathinubbhārā, na tu saṅghā, na bhikkhuto.
tika-vin10t:8696: Tattha yo cīvaruppādo, ānisaṃsā ca pañcime.
tika-vin10t:8706: Tattha sīmāya detīti, antosīmaṃ gatehi tu;
tika-vin10t:8709: Katikāya ca dinnaṃ ye, vihārā ekalābhakā;
tika-vin10t:8712: Saṅghassa dhuvakārā hi, yattha karīyanti tattha ca;
tika-vin10t:8715: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, ujubhūtena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:8719: Thokā vā bahu vā bhikkhū, samabhāgova vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8721: Vassaṃvuṭṭhassa saṅghassa, cīvaraṃ deti yaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:8724: Yāguyā pana bhatte vā, detiādissa ce pana;
tika-vin10t:8727: Puggalaṃ pana uddissa, cīvaraṃ yaṃ tu dīyati;
tika-vin10t:8728: Puggalodissakaṃ nāma, dānaṃ taṃ tu pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:8731: Ayaṃ mayhaṃ parikkhāro, mātuyā pitunopi vā.
tika-vin10t:8734: Na hoti pana taṃ tesaṃ, saṅghasseva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8736: Pañcannaṃ accaye dānaṃ, na ca rūhati kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8737: Saṅghasseva ca taṃ hoti, gihīnaṃ pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8739: Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā, kālaṃ bhikkhunupassaye;
tika-vin10t:8742: Bhikkhunī sāmaṇerī vā, vihārasmiṃ sace matā;
tika-vin10t:8743: Honti tassā parikkhārā, bhikkhunīnaṃ tu santakā.
tika-vin10t:8748: Evaṃ dinnavidhiṃ ñatvā, matassa vāmatassa vā;
tika-vin10t:8755: Pattesu alliyā pattaṃ, tathā pattañca nīliyā.
tika-vin10t:8757: Kusumbhaṃ kiṃsukaṃ pupphe, tace loddañca kaṇḍulaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8758: Ṭhapetvā rajanaṃ sabbaṃ, phalaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8761: Alliyā pana pattena, dhovituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8763: Cīvarānaṃ kathā sesā, paṭhame kathine pana;
tika-vin10t:8780: Ratticchedo kathaṃ vutto, vattabhedo kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:8804: Oṇojanaṃ tathā bhattaṃ, labhate pañcime pana.
tika-vin10t:8811: Etāni pana cattāri, vuttāni ca mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:8818: Etesaṃ tu catunnampi, samattā samathā matā.
tika-vin10t:8826: Vivādo sammati dvīhi, anuvādo catūhi ca;
tika-vin10t:8844: Lajjī alajjī bāloti, kena sakkā vijānituṃ?
tika-vin10t:8850: Nāpajjati ca sañcicca, āpattiṃ na ca gūhati;
tika-vin10t:8859: Alajjī sānuvādo ca, asucī kammato ca yo;
tika-vin10t:8868: Yathā ca tiṇapaṇṇena, channaṃ gūthañca muttakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8869: Na ca vāyati duggandhaṃ, vūpasammati taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:8872: Diṭṭhāvikammikañceva, yo ca tattha na hoti taṃ.
tika-vin10t:8879: Rukkhe vā pana kuṭṭevā, aṭṭāne thambhakesu vā;
tika-vin10t:8886: Kataṃ taṃ mallakaṃ nāma, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8892: Vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, katakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8897: Osaṇheyya sake kese, yo hatthaphaṇakena vā;
tika-vin10t:8906: Ādāse udapatte vā, yattha katthaci attano;
tika-vin10t:8912: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8913: Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8921: ‘‘Passissāmī’’ti naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā pana vāditaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8922: Vihārato vihāraṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8925: Ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā, passatopi ca vīthiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8927: Kesā dīghā na dhāreyyā, yo dhāreyyassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8928: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8930: Nakhe nāsikalomāni, dīghāni na tu dhāraye;
tika-vin10t:8931: Na ca vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ vā, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:8933: Kappāpeyya visuṃ massuṃ, dāṭhikaṃ vā ṭhapeyya yo;
tika-vin10t:8934: Saṃharāpeyya vā lomaṃ, sambādhe tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8936: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kese kattarikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:8943: Na doso chindato aṅgaṃ, mocentassa ca lohitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8948: Na bhuñje na pive naggo, na khāde na ca sāyaye;
tika-vin10t:8949: Na dade na ca gaṇheyya, na gaccheyyapi añjasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8952: Parikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ, na naggena ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:8957: Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ, bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8961: Ekamañcepi vā tesaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8964: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyya, palitaṃ na ca gāhaye.
tika-vin10t:8969: Agilāno sace bhikkhu, chattaṃ dhāreyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8978: Lokāyataṃ na vāceyya, na ca taṃ pariyāpuṇe;
tika-vin10t:8981: Na ca vaṭṭati dhāretuṃ, sabbā cāmaribījanī;
tika-vin10t:8982: Na cālimpeyya dāyaṃ vā, na ca lañje mukhampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8993: Lasuṇaṃ na ca khādeyya, sace nākallako siyā;
tika-vin10t:9003: Na ca dhāraṇiyā uṇhī, sabbā bāhiralomikā.
tika-vin10t:9023: Dīghato ca diyaḍḍhaṃ vā, dvihatthanti kurundiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9032: Suddhaṃ tamālapattañca, paṇṇesu na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9039: Yadetaṃ tividhaṃ tūlaṃ, bhisiyaṃ taṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9040: Missaṃ tamālapattaṃ tu, sabbattha pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9043: Kārentassa karoto vā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9045: Jātakaṃ pana vatthuṃ vā, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:9048: Samānāsaniko nāma, dvīhi vassehi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:9049: Vuḍḍho vā daharo vāpi, vassenekena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:9054: Heṭṭhā dīghāsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, yaṃ pahoti nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9055: Ekamañcepi pīṭhe vā, dve nisīdanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9068: Pātova gāhite añño, bhikkhu senāsane pana;
tika-vin10t:9069: Sace yācati āgantvā, vattabbo gāhitanti so.
tika-vin10t:9075: Gahetvā kappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, datvā tassattano pana.
tika-vin10t:9078: Gāhitaṃ gaṇha’’iccevaṃ, vatvā gacchati so disaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9080: Uppabbajati ce tattha, gataṭṭhāne, na labbhati;
tika-vin10t:9081: Gahetuṃ tassa sampattaṃ, saṅghikaṃyeva taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:9083: Manusse sammukhā tattha, paṭicchāpeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:9086: Ārāmo ca vihāro ca, vatthūni duvidhassapi;
tika-vin10t:9090: Vāsi pharasu kuddālo, kuṭhārī ca nikhādanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9092: Valli veḷu tiṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ, muñjapabbajameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9093: Mattikā dārubhaṇḍañca, pañcamaṃ tu yathāha ca.
tika-vin10t:9104: Bhikkhunā garubhaṇḍaṃ tu, saṅghena hi gaṇena vā;
tika-vin10t:9121: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ taṃ, lohabhaṇḍaṃ tu kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9128: Na doso saṅghike atthi, gihīnaṃ santakesu vā.
tika-vin10t:9146: Kiñci saṅghassa dinnaṃ ce, taṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9148: Nhāpitassa ca saṇḍāso, kattarī ca mahattarī;
tika-vin10t:9151: Valli saṅghassa dinnā vā, tatthajātāpi rakkhitā;
tika-vin10t:9157: Nāḷikerassa hīre vā, vāke vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9160: Veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā, rakkhito tatthajātako;
tika-vin10t:9166: Muñjādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, muṭṭhimattaṃ garuṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:9170: Mattikā pakatī vāpi, pañcavaṇṇā sudhāpi vā.
tika-vin10t:9172: Silesādīsu vā kiñci, dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9178: Rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ vāpi, gahetabbaṃ tu gaṇhatā;
tika-vin10t:9179: Samakaṃ atirekaṃ vā, datvā phātikameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9206: Bījanī pacchi caṅkoṭaṃ, sabbā sammuñjanī garu.
tika-vin10t:9208: Yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yo koci kaṭasārako;
tika-vin10t:9226: Patto kañcanako ceva, thālakaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9248: Patto avassikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, likhitvā ṭhapitopi ca.
tika-vin10t:9254: Gahetuṃ labhati taṃ pacchā, sāmaṇerassa pāḷiyā.
tika-vin10t:9257: Ajja so upasampanno, atītā ṭhitikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:9259: Sace pana salākā tu, laddhā bhattaṃ na taṃdine;
tika-vin10t:9260: Laddhaṃ, punadine tassa, gāhetabbaṃ, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:9263: Visuñhi ṭhitikā katvā, dātabbā tu salākikā.
tika-vin10t:9266: Laddhamuttaribhaṅgaṃ vā, na laddhaṃ bhattameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9268: Yena yena hi yaṃ yaṃ tu, na laddhaṃ, tassa tassa ca;
tika-vin10t:9269: Taṃ taṃ punadine cāpi, gāhetabbanti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9295: Oguṇṭhanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, sīse cīvarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9296: Na hi tena ca dhotabbā, pādā pānīyavārinā.
tika-vin10t:9322: Iccevaṃ pana vattabbaṃ, deyyaṃ senāsanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9330: Sahasā pavise nāpi, sahasā na ca nikkhame;
tika-vin10t:9340: Nakkhattaṃ tena yogo ca, jānitabbā disāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:9345: Sahasā ubbhajitvā vā, na ca vaccakuṭiṃ vise;
tika-vin10t:9346: Ukkāsitvā bahi ṭhatvā, pavise saṇikaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9348: Vaccaṃ na nitthunantena, kātabbaṃ pana bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:9349: Khādato dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9351: Vaccaṃ pana na kātabbaṃ, bahiddhā vaccadoṇiyā;
tika-vin10t:9355: Chaḍḍeyya na ca pāteyya, kheḷaṃ passāvadoṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9360: Nācameyya sace vaccaṃ, katvā yo salile sati;
tika-vin10t:9363: Sasaddaṃ nācametabbaṃ, katvā capu capūti ca;
tika-vin10t:9370: Chaḍḍeyya kumbhi rittā ce, kumbhiṃ pūreyya vārinā.
tika-vin10t:9372: Anajjhiṭṭho hi vuḍḍhena, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9373: Dhammaṃ na ca bhaṇe, pañhaṃ, na puccheyya na vissaje.
tika-vin10t:9379: Anāpucchā hi sajjhāyo, na kātabbo kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:9381: Uddesopi na kātabbo, paripucchāya kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9382: Na ca dhammo kathetabbo, bhikkhunā dhammacakkhunā.
tika-vin10t:9384: Na dīpo vijjhāpetabbo, kātabbo vā na ceva so;
tika-vin10t:9388: Tampi cīvarakaṇṇena, kāyena na ca ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9390: Purato neva therānaṃ, nhāyeyya na panūpari;
tika-vin10t:9391: Uttaraṃ otarantānaṃ, dade maggaṃ, na ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9399: Tasmā hi vattaṃ pūreyya, jinaputto vicakkhaṇo;
tika-vin10t:9404: Kāyaṃ ūruṃ thanaṃ vāpi, vivaritvāna bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9405: Attano aṅgajātaṃ vā, bhikkhussa na ca dassaye.
tika-vin10t:9407: Bhikkhunā saha yaṃ kiñci, sampayojentiyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9408: Tato bhāsantiyā bhikkhuṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9410: Na ca bhikkhuniyā dīghaṃ, dhāreyya kāyabandhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9413: Vilīvena ca paṭṭena, cammapaṭṭena vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9416: Na phāsukā nametabbā, dukkaṭaṃ tu namentiyā;
tika-vin10t:9419: Hatthaṃ vā hatthakocchaṃ vā, pādaṃ vā mukhamūrukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9420: Koṭṭāpeti sace tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9422: Na mukhaṃ limpitabbaṃ tu, na cuṇṇetabbameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9425: Aṅgarāgo na kātabbo, mukharāgopi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9426: Avaṅgaṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, na kātabbaṃ visesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9429: Ṭhātabbaṃ na ca sāloke, sanaccaṃ na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:9432: Suraṃ vā pana maṃsaṃ vā, paṇṇaṃ vā vikkiṇantiyā.
tika-vin10t:9434: Vaḍḍhiṃ vāpi vaṇijjaṃ vā, payojetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9435: Tirīṭaṃ kañcukaṃ vāpi, yadi dhāreti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9437: Dāso vā pana dāsī vā, tathā kammakaropi vā;
tika-vin10t:9440: Na ca bhikkhuniyā sabba-nīlādiṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9441: Dhāretabbaṃ, na dhāreyya, sabbaṃ namatakampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9446: Dūratova ca passitvā, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9449: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca passitvā, pattaṃ bhikkhaṃ carantiyā;
tika-vin10t:9461: Yassā pabbajjakāle tu, gabbho vuṭṭhāti itthiyā;
tika-vin10t:9462: Putto yadi ca tassāpi, dātabbā dutiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:9465: Maṇḍetumpi ure katvā, setuṃ labhati sā pana.
tika-vin10t:9467: Ṭhapetvā sahaseyyaṃ tu, tasmiṃ dutiyikāya hi;
tika-vin10t:9470: Vibbhameneva sā hoti, yasmā idha abhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9479: Na vaccakuṭiyā vacco, kātabbo yāya kāyaci;
tika-vin10t:9482: Na ca vaṭṭati sabbattha, pallaṅkena nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9485: Na ca bhikkhuniyāraññe, vatthabbaṃ tu kathañcana;
tika-vin10t:9486: Atitthe naratitthe vā, nhāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9489: Nhāyeyya paṭisote vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9492: Dinnaṃ abhutvā aññassa, dentiyā pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9516: Cīvarādiparikkhāraṃ, saṅgho yaṃ deti tassa hi.
tika-vin10t:9519: Evaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ tu, hoti taṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9522: Sammuti ceva dānañca, paṭiggāho ca sattamo.
tika-vin10t:9528: Tassa nissāraṇā vuttā, yā sā nissāraṇāti hi.
tika-vin10t:9554: Sammuti nāma sīmādi, sā pañcadasadhā matā;
tika-vin10t:9579: Imesaṃ tu vasā ñeyyā, dasekā samanubhāsanā.
tika-vin10t:9590: Sesāni apaloketvā, kātuṃ pana na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9611: Na parāmasati vatthuñca, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9613: Na parāmasati ñattiṃ vā, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:9617: Na parāmasati vatthuṃ vā, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9623: Vuttā uposathe tāva, khandhake sabbaso mayā.
tika-vin10t:9626: Chando ca na panānīto, paṭikkosanti sammukhā.
tika-vin10t:9628: Evaṃ tivaṅgiko doso, parisāya vasā siyā;
tika-vin10t:9629: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chando ca na panāgato.
tika-vin10t:9632: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chandopi ca samāhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:9637: Catutthikā siyuṃ dosā, dasa dve parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:9638: Evaṃ dvādasadhā ettha, kammāni hi vipajjare.
tika-vin10t:9643: Suṇātha nipuṇe pañhe, gūḷhatthe bhaṇato mama.
tika-vin10t:9645: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattiṃyeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:9646: Kathañca paṭiggaṇhanto, na gaṇhanto kathaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9652: Asamāpattilābhissa, kā ca nāmassa sā bhave.
tika-vin10t:9654: Garukaṃ bhaṇato saccaṃ, alikaṃ bhaṇato siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:9655: Lahuṃ saccaṃ bhaṇantassa, musā ca bhaṇato garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9657: Pavisanto ca ārāmaṃ, āpajjati na nikkhamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9658: Nikkhamantova āpatti, na ceva pavisaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:9665: Āpajjati ca dhārento, adhārento tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:9666: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti? Bhaṇāhi me.
tika-vin10t:9669: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātāpitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:9671: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9672: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhave;
tika-vin10t:9679: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, na so pārājiko kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9684: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:9685: Chiddaṃ gehassa nevatthi, kathaṃ methunato cuto;
tika-vin10t:9691: Sabbattha nipuṇā dhīrā, ime pañhe bhaṇanti te.
tika-vin10t:9698: Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:9699: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9702: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9707: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin10t:9708: Bhinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9714: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9716: Pattassa pariyante vā, tathā pattamukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:9717: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9723: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:9728: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vā, aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9729: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9737: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9739: Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9740: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9742: Saṅkhena maṇinā vāpi, aññenapi ca kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9743: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9745: Cīvaraṃ doṇiyaṃ katvā, nāpi ghaṭṭeyya muṭṭhinā;
tika-vin10t:9746: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9748: Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9751: Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:9752: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin10t:9754: Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin10t:9758: Na doso koci tatthassa, kātuṃ makaradantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9761: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9763: Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:9769: Akkhīni tattha dassetvā, koṭṭite pana kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9770: Kakkaṭakkhīni vā tattha, uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9772: Ghaṭaṃ deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā, makarassa mukhampi vā;
tika-vin10t:9773: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin10t:9775: Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9782: Rajjuyo na ca vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9785: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:9788: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9790: Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
tika-vin10t:9800: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin10t:9802: Tādisaṃ pana ghaṃsitvā, veṭhetvā suttakena vā;
tika-vin10t:9803: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:9805: Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin10t:9812: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9815: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:9818: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9821: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9824: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9827: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:9835: Tathā pattapidhāne ca, tālavaṇṭe ca bījane;
tika-vin10t:9849: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, na uddissa davaṃ kare;
tika-vin10t:9852: Kāyaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ vā, ūruṃ vā na tu dassaye;
tika-vin10t:9853: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu tā vāpi, na siñce udakādinā.
tika-vin10t:9856: Dukkaṭaṃ puna dātabbaṃ, gīvā naṭṭhepi jajjare.
tika-vin10t:9858: Codito so sace tehi, bhikkhūhi na dadeyyataṃ;
tika-vin10t:9862: Davā silaṃ pavijjhanto, dukkaṭā na ca muccati.
tika-vin10t:9870: Na ca bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, sampayojeyya kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9873: Bhikkhunīnaṃ have bhikkhu, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9874: Āpattiṃ vā sace tāsaṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9880: Aggaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ vā, pattādīsupyayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:9889: Pakkhipitvāna pākatthaṃ, cāletuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9892: Tattha cādīnavaṃ tassa, vattuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9895: Kataṃ nissāya dussīlaṃ, tayā viharatā’’ti ca.
tika-vin10t:9897: Bhattagge yāgupāne ca, antogāme ca vīthiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9900: Sutto khādañca bhuñjanto, vaccaṃ muttampi vā karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9906: Ekādasa abhabbā ca, garukaṭṭhā ca pañcime;
tika-vin10t:9907: Vandato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bāvīsati ca puggale.
tika-vin10t:9910: Dhammavādī ca sambuddho, vandanīyā tayo ime.
tika-vin10t:9915: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ panekassa, dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9924: Tattha appaṭikammā ca, yā ca vuṭṭhānagāminī;
tika-vin10t:9943: Tatraṭṭho pana so dvinnaṃ, kammaṃ kopeti saṅghikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9958: Vuttā samaṇakappā ca, pañca, pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-vin10t:9960: Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ, vidhiṃ paññattiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9969: Nidānaṃ tattha vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9973: Satāni hi cha ūnāni, tīṇi sāvatthiyā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9975: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t:9976: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhagge pakāsitā.
tika-vin10t:9982: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti te.
tika-vin10t:9999: Idaṃ catubbidhaṃ sīlaṃ, ñatvā tattha patiṭṭhito;
tika-vin10t:10030: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, na vaḍḍhetabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t:10036: Viññāṇaṃ nevasaññā ca, dasa dve bhāvagocarā.
tika-vin10t:10044: Tāni dvādasa bhiyyo ca, ānāpānasatīpi ca;
tika-vin10t:10045: Sabbaso terasa vāpi, brahmaloke na jāyare.
tika-vin10t:10048: Aññe pana na jāyanti, sabbe jāyanti mānuse.
tika-vin10t:10050: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā ca dasāsubhā;
tika-vin10t:10059: Bhavanti hi abhiññāṇaṃ, kasiṇāni dasāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:10084: Cariyāyānukūlaṃ tu, tesu yaṃ attano pana.
tika-vin10t:10098: Tiṇṇaṃ tesaṃ vavatthāne, kate ettāvatā pana;
tika-vin10t:10099: Tiṇṇaṃ pana ca saccānaṃ, vavatthānaṃ kataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10113: Teneva ca upāyena, bhāvento so punappunaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10122: Yadi akkharabandhe vā, ayuttaṃ viya dissati.
tika-vin10t:10128: Sabbassa pana lokassa, gāme sampiṇḍite viya.
tika-vin10t:10163: Yathā siddhimayaṃ patto, antarāyaṃ vinā tathā;
tika-vin10t:10173: Karontena pattaṃ mayā yaṃ tu puññaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10178: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racitoyaṃ vinayavinicchayo.
tika-vin10t:10187: Yo mayā racito sāro, vinayassa vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t:10200: Thullaccayaṃ mukhe vaṭṭa-kate vuttaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10208: Māse vā dukkaṭaṃ ūne, majjhe thullaccayaṃ tato.
tika-vin10t:10216: Dukkhe thullaccayaṃ jāte, mate pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10222: Thullaccayaṃ pariyāye, ñāte, no ce tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10231: Dvaṅge thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10237: Āmasantassa kāyena, kāyaṃ tu garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10239: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10243: Vaṇṇāvaṇṇaṃ vadaṃ dvinnaṃ, maggānaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10249: Santike garukaṃ hoti, sace jānāti sā pana.
tika-vin10t:10258: Aṅge sati panekasmiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10269: Anuddhaṃseti yo tassa, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10271: Okāsaṃ na ca kāretvā, hutvā cāvanacetano;
tika-vin10t:10278: Sabbo āpattibhedo hi, natthi kāci visesatā.
tika-vin10t:10307: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10310: Cīvaraṃ viññāpento dve, bhikkhu āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10327: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10332: Nipphādeti sace tassa, honti āpattiyo duve;
tika-vin10t:10333: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10337: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10340: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, nissaggiṃ dutiye phuse.
tika-vin10t:10343: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, dhote nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10346: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nissaggi gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10349: Samāpanne ca nissaggiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10352: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, kate nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10359: Aññaṃ pana navaṃ pattaṃ, cetāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:10361: Dve panāpattiyo bhikkhu, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:10362: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10365: Ekaṃ nissaggiyāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi so pana.
tika-vin10t:10368: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10370: Bhikkhuno cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindanto duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10371: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, haṭe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10374: Vāyāpeti sace bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10379: Dve panāpattiyo so hi, āpajjati, na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:10380: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10383: Kālaṃ atikkamento taṃ, ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10386: Chārattato vinā tena, vasaṃ nissaggiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10388: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, saṅghikaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t:10389: Pariṇāmeti ce bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10412: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10415: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, panne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10421: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pāde, pāde pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10424: Āroceti sace tassa, honti dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10429: Pathaviṃ khaṇato tassa, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10430: Pahāre ca pahāre ca, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t:10433: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pātento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10434: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tassa, pāte pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:10437: Aropite dukkaṭaṃ tu, hoti pācitti ropite.
tika-vin10t:10439: Ujjhāpento paraṃ bhikkhuṃ, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10452: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10458: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesaṃ nikkaḍḍhite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10466: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t:10467: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, sitte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10473: Dutiye tatiye ceva, catutthepi ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:10476: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu aññāti-kāya dento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10477: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10480: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti pana sibbite.
tika-vin10t:10483: Saṃvidhāya tu gacchanto, phuse dve dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10494: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, nisajjaṃ tu raho pana;
tika-vin10t:10495: Kappento hi phuse dvepi, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10501: Dutiye tatiye cāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t:10505: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10516: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10521: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, dinne pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10523: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, uyyojento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10526: Nisajjaṃ bhikkhu kappento, kule pana sabhojane;
tika-vin10t:10529: Catutthe pañcame vāpi, viseso natthi kocipi;
tika-vin10t:10532: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, sabhatto ca nimantito;
tika-vin10t:10533: Kulesu pana cārittaṃ, āpajjanto duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10536: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10538: Taduttariṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, viññāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10541: Uyyuttaṃ dassanatthāya, gacchanto dve phuse balaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10542: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t:10545: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti vasite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10547: Uyyodhikaṃ tu gacchanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10548: Gacchanto dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti passato.
tika-vin10t:10551: Suraṃ vā pana mereyyaṃ, pivanto dve phuse muni;
tika-vin10t:10552: Gaṇhato dukkaṭaṃ pātuṃ, pīte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10555: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti hasite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10557: Kīḷanto udake bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10560: Yo panādariyaṃ bhikkhu, karonto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10561: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10563: Bhiṃsāpento have bhikkhu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10569: Oraso addhamāsassa, nhāyanto dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10586: Manusso marati tasmiṃ, patitvā ce parājayo.
tika-vin10t:10589: Patitvā maratī peto, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10594: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, paribhuñjaṃ duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10595: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10600: Jānaṃ bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento pana vajjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10604: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ patto, sesā sampādite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10606: Jānaṃ tu theyyasatthena, saṃvidhāya saheva ca;
tika-vin10t:10609: Dve panāpattiyo honti, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10612: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10616: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10625: Vinayaṃ tu vivaṇṇento, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10628: Mohento dve phuse, mohe, dukkaṭaṃ tu aropite;
tika-vin10t:10631: Pahāraṃ kupito dento, bhikkhussa dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10632: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pahaṭe siyā.
tika-vin10t:10635: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuggirite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10638: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuddhaṃsite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10640: Bhikkhu sañcicca kukkuccaṃ, janayanto hi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:10641: Dve phuse dukkaṭaṃ yoge, pācittuppādite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10644: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ sotuṃ, pācitti suṇato siyā.
tika-vin10t:10646: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā tato puna;
tika-vin10t:10650: Adatvā gacchato tassa, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10652: Hatthapāsaṃ tu saṅghassa, jahato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10655: Samaggena ca saṅghena, datvāna saha cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10656: Khīyanto dve phuse pacchā, payoge dukkaṭādayo.
tika-vin10t:10658: Lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ jānaṃ, saṅghikaṃ puggalassa hi;
tika-vin10t:10662: Pubbe avidito hutvā, rañño antepuraṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:10666: Dukkaṭaṃ pana uddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10668: Ratanaṃ pana gaṇhanto, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10669: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassa, pācitti gahite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10671: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā, vikāle gāmakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:10672: Samaṇo pavisaṃ dose, āpajjati duve pana.
tika-vin10t:10675: Dukkaṭaṃ tassa niddiṭṭhaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10681: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10683: Tūlonaddhaṃ tu mañcādiṃ, kārāpento duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10684: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, tasmiṃ, sesā kārāpite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10686: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10703: Kati āpattiyo honti? Catassova bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:10706: Mate akkhāyite vāpi, bhikkhu pārājikaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:10712: Kati āpattiyo honti? Pañca āpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:10717: Kāyena phusato kāyaṃ, bhikkhussa garukaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10718: Kāyena kāyabaddhaṃ tu, phusaṃ thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10740: Chādentī bhikkhunī vajjaṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10741: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, chādentī sā parājikā.
tika-vin10t:10752: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, tisso āpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10756: Pūrentī aṭṭhamaṃ vatthuṃ, samaṇī sā parājitā.
tika-vin10t:10768: Ekā gāmantaraṃ gacche, gamane dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10775: Āpattīnaṃ pabhede tu, kāci natthi visesatā.
tika-vin10t:10786: ‘‘Sahatthena gahetvā tvaṃ, khāda vā bhuñja vā’’tipi;
tika-vin10t:10787: Uyyojentī panevaṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10793: Uyyojeti ca yā tassā, imā tissoti dīpaye.
tika-vin10t:10795: Sattame aṭṭhame cāpi, navame dasamepi ca;
tika-vin10t:10800: Ekaṃ nissaggiyaṃyeva, phuse pācittiyaṃ tu sā.
tika-vin10t:10803: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10806: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, chinne, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10808: Viññāpetvāva aññaṃ ce, viññāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10811: Cetāpetvā hi aññaṃ ce, cetāpeti tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10814: Evameva ca sesesu, chaṭṭhādīsu ca sattasu;
tika-vin10t:10818: Lasuṇaṃ khādati dve ce, dukkaṭaṃ gahaṇe siyā;
tika-vin10t:10821: Saṃharāpentiyā lomaṃ, sambādhe dveva honti hi;
tika-vin10t:10822: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti saṃhaṭe.
tika-vin10t:10824: Karontī talaghātaṃ tu, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10825: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10827: Jatunā maṭṭhakaṃ kiñci, sādiyantī duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10834: Hatthapāse tu pācitti, hitvā tiṭṭhati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10839: Uccārādiṃ tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍentī dve phuse have;
tika-vin10t:10840: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10843: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti chaḍḍite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10849: Paṭhame dutiye ceva, tatiye ca catutthake;
tika-vin10t:10853: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, pakkamantī duve phuse.
tika-vin10t:10858: Sāmike tu anāpucchā, āsane ce nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:10859: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti ca nisīdite.
tika-vin10t:10861: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ sabbaṃ, samānaṃ aṭṭhame pana;
tika-vin10t:10867: Vadhitvā pana attānaṃ, rodantī tu duve phuse;
tika-vin10t:10868: Vadhati rodati pācitti, karotekaṃ tu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:10871: Naggā nhāyati dve ceva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:10877: Cīvaraṃ tu visibbetvā, visibbāpetva vā pana;
tika-vin10t:10883: Sace saṅkamanīyaṃ tu, dhāreti pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:10884: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, pācitti pana dhārite.
tika-vin10t:10887: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10903: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tāsaṃ, nipanne itaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10906: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10911: Sace upassayaṃ datvā, nikkaḍḍhati ca bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t:10912: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, hoti pācitti kaḍḍhite.
tika-vin10t:10914: Chaṭṭhe pana ca saṃsaṭṭhā, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:10917: Antoraṭṭhe tu sāsaṅke, cārikaṃ tu carantiyā;
tika-vin10t:10925: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi passati.
tika-vin10t:10928: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bhutte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10930: Suttaṃ kantantiyā dveva, payoge dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:10933: Veyyāvaccaṃ gihīnaṃ tu, dveva honti karontiyā;
tika-vin10t:10934: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kate pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10937: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ chaṭṭhe, dinne pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10940: Aṭṭhamaṃ dutiye vagge, pañcamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:10943: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti hi pade pade.
tika-vin10t:10953: Dukkaṭaṃ piṭake vuttaṃ, pācitti dutiyena tu.
tika-vin10t:10955: Akkosati ca yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t:10958: Yā hi caṇḍikabhāvena, gaṇaṃ tu paribhāsati;
tika-vin10t:10962: Bhuñjantī bhikkhunī sā hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse.
tika-vin10t:10967: Kulaṃ tu maccharāyantī, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:10968: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, sesā maccharite siyā.
tika-vin10t:10976: Ovādatthāya vā bhikkhuṃ, saṃvāsatthāya vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:10977: Na gacchati sace tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:10979: Ovādampi na yācantī, na gacchantī uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:10986: Gabbhiniṃ vuṭṭhapentī hi, dve panāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:11003: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, pacchā, hoti pācitti khīyite.
tika-vin10t:11005: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:11010: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, hoti pācitti dhārite.
tika-vin10t:11012: Yānena pana yāyantī, dve kirāpattiyo phuse;
tika-vin10t:11013: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, pācitti yadi yāyite.
tika-vin10t:11015: Dhārentiyā tu saṅghāṇiṃ, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:11016: Dhārite pana pācitti, catutthepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:11022: Sattame aṭṭhame ceva, navame dasamepi ca.
tika-vin10t:11027: Anāpucchā tu bhikkhussa, purato yā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:11028: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti tu nisīdite.
tika-vin10t:11031: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ hoti, vuttā pācitti pucchite.
tika-vin10t:11041: Tato bhikkhuniyā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11060: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:11061: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:11063: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:11064: Attano pana duṭṭhullaṃ, chādento dukkaṭaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:11075: Accajaṃ pāpikaṃ diṭṭhiṃ, ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:11088: Bhikkhunī tu sace hoti, pāṭidesaniyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:11090: Ājīvahetu sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā panattano;
tika-vin10t:11113: Jānaṃ pārājikaṃ dhammaṃ, sace chādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:11114: Cutā, thullaccayaṃ hoti, sace vematikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:11116: Pācitti bhikkhu saṅghādi-sesaṃ chādeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:11125: Thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi sā phuse;
tika-vin10t:11129: Na pariccajati taṃ laddhiṃ, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t:11139: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, kati āpattiyo siyuṃ?
tika-vin10t:11140: Khandhake paṭhame tāva, dve panāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:11143: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11154: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassa, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11159: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, khandhake tu pavāraṇe?
tika-vin10t:11162: Kati āpattiyo vuttā, camme? Tissova dīpitā;
tika-vin10t:11163: Mārentānaṃ tu pācitti, gahetvā vacchatariṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:11166: Tassa thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, sesesu pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11174: Kathine natthi āpatti, paññattaṃ kevalaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:11189: Chandassa dāyako bhikkhu, pācitti yadi khīyati;
tika-vin10t:11195: Attano aṅgajātaṃ tu, chindaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:11196: Romanthe hoti pācitti, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11198: Tathā senāsanasmiṃ tu, tisso āpattiyo siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:11232: Tesu ekena vā dvīhi, tīhi vātha catūhi vā;
tika-vin10t:11235: Tattha pañcasamuṭṭhānā, kā cāpatti na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:11245: Pacchimehi ca tīheva, samuṭṭhāti na aññato.
tika-vin10t:11269: Tattha yā tu catutthena, samuṭṭhānena jāyate;
tika-vin10t:11308: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ tattha, catutthaṃ navamampi ca;
tika-vin10t:11315: Sabhojane, raho dve ca, aṅgulī, udake hasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:11317: Pahāre, uggire ceva, tepaññāsā ca sekhiyā;
tika-vin10t:11339: Ukkoṭanaṃ =00 tathā ūno, saṃvāso, nāsanena ca;
tika-vin10t:11343: Kiṃ te, akālaṃ, acchinde, duggahā, nirayena vā.
tika-vin10t:11345: Gaṇassa ca vibhaṅgañca, dubbalāsā tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:11348: Sayaṃ upassayaṃ datvā, akkoseyya ca caṇḍikā;
tika-vin10t:11351: Pāyantiṃ, dve ca vassāni, saṅghenāsammatampi ca;
tika-vin10t:11354: Ūnadvādasavassā dve, tathālaṃ tāva teti ca;
tika-vin10t:11373: Pūvehi, paccayo jotiṃ, ratanaṃ, sūci, mañcakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11374: Tūlaṃ, nisīdanaṃ, kaṇḍu, vassikā, sugatassa ca.
tika-vin10t:11377: Saṅghikena duve vuttā, dve mahājanikena ca.
tika-vin10t:11389: Appasaddā duve vuttā, tathā na byāhareti ca;
tika-vin10t:11390: Chamā, nīcāsane, ṭhānaṃ, pacchato, uppathena ca.
tika-vin10t:11393: Paccakkhāmīti sikkhā ca, tathā kismiñcideva ca.
tika-vin10t:11395: Saṃsaṭṭhā dve, vadhitvā ca, visibbetvā ca dukkhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11396: Punadeva ca saṃsaṭṭhā, neva vūpasameyya ca.
tika-vin10t:11401: Sace me cīvaraṃ ayye, anubandhissasīti ca;
tika-vin10t:11408: Kathināni ca tīṇādi, patto, bhesajjameva ca;
tika-vin10t:11431: Naggaṃ, attharaṇaṃ, mañce, antoraṭṭhe, tathā bahi.
tika-vin10t:11434: Veyyāvaccaṃ, sahatthā ca, āvāse ca abhikkhuke.
tika-vin10t:11446: Sabbe cha panime dhammā, vācato vācacittato;
tika-vin10t:11453: Etā =03 catusamuṭṭhānā, sikkhā cuddasa honti hi;
tika-vin10t:11458: Paṭicchanne ca okāse, byūhe cāti ime chapi.
tika-vin10t:11477: Pañca āpattiyo honti, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu.
tika-vin10t:11485: Kati =04 āpattiyo honti, dutiyena tuvaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11489: Karonti ce kuṭiṃ tassa, vipannaṃ sabbathā pana.
tika-vin10t:11494: Tatiyena kati jāyanti, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11505: Siyuṃ kati catutthena, samuṭṭhānena me bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11508: Hoti pārājikaṃ tassa, kuṭiṃ saṃyācikāya tu;
tika-vin10t:11514: Kati āpattiyo honti, pañcamena? Cha honti hi;
tika-vin10t:11522: Vāceti padaso dhammaṃ, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:11526: Cha ca saṃvidahitvāna, bhaṇḍaṃ harati ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:11546: Kā panāpattiyo nāma, lahukā garukāpi kā?
tika-vin10t:11549: Duṭṭhullā nāma kāpatti, aduṭṭhullāpi nāma kā?
tika-vin10t:11551: Niyatā nāma kāpatti, kā panāniyatāpi ca?
tika-vin10t:11576: Bhikkhū ca bhabbā atha bhikkhunī ca.
tika-vin10t:11601: Kathañhi =07 bhaṇato saccaṃ, garukaṃ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t:11607: Kathaṃ musā bhaṇantassa, garukaṃ hoti bhikkhuno?
tika-vin10t:11608: Kathañca bhaṇato saccaṃ, āpatti lahukā siyā?
tika-vin10t:11613: Kathaṃ bhūmigato dosaṃ, na vehāsagato phuse?
tika-vin10t:11614: Kathaṃ vehāsago dosaṃ, na ca bhūmigato phuse?
tika-vin10t:11622: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjati, na nikkhamaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11623: Pavisanto kathaṃ bhikkhu, pavisanto na ceva taṃ?
tika-vin10t:11629: Nikkhamantova āpattiṃ, phuseyya, pavisaṃ na ca.
tika-vin10t:11638: Yevaṃ anādiyantova, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11644: Samādiyanto āpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11646: Yo hi kammakato bhikkhu, vuttaṃ vattaṃ panattano;
tika-vin10t:11650: Na karonto kathaṃ nāma, samaṇo dosavā siyā?
tika-vin10t:11656: Akaronto panāpattiṃ, āpajjati hi nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11658: Dento āpajjatāpattiṃ, na dentopi kathaṃ bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:11659: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:11661: Cīvaraṃ dadamāno hi, dento āpajjate pana;
tika-vin10t:11671: Ovādañca na gaṇhanto, āpajjati hi vajjataṃ.
tika-vin10t:11676: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ vatthuṃ, accajitvā nisevati;
tika-vin10t:11677: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11680: Ayaṃ tu paribhogena, āpajjati hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:11682: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattimeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:11685: Sagāraseyyakaṃ =09 rattiṃ, āpajjati hi no divā;
tika-vin10t:11697: Na chindanto nakhe kese, āpajjati hi nāma so;
tika-vin10t:11703: Āpajjati hi dhārento, na dhārento kathaṃ pana?
tika-vin10t:11710: Atthāpatti hi tiṭṭhante, nāthe, no parinibbute;
tika-vin10t:11716: Āpattiyo imā dvepi, ṭhapetvā sugate pana;
tika-vin10t:11719: Kāleyeva siyāpatti, vikāle na siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11720: Vikāle tu siyāpatti, na kāle, ubhayatthapi?
tika-vin10t:11726: Sabbaṃ kāle vikāle ca, natthi tattha ca saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11728: Rattimeva panāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:11732: Divā, sesā panāpatti, siyā rattiṃ divāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:11734: Dasavasso tu no ūna-dasavasso siyā kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11738: Āpattiṃ pana abyatto, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11743: Kāḷe āpajjatāpattiṃ, na juṇhe juṇhake kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11746: Vassaṃ anupagacchanto, kāḷe, no juṇhake pana;
tika-vin10t:11750: Kāḷe ceva ca juṇhe ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:11752: Vassūpagamanaṃ kāḷe, no juṇhe, tu pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:11753: Juṇhe kappati, no kāḷe, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t:11756: Gimheyeva na sesesu, vasse no itaradvaye.
tika-vin10t:11761: Āpajjati ca hemante, nivāseti ca taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:11773: Ovassāpeti yo kāyaṃ, vasse āpajjatīdha so.
tika-vin10t:11775: Āpajjati hi saṅghova, na gaṇo na ca puggalo;
tika-vin10t:11776: Gaṇova na ca sesā hi, puggalova na cāpare.
tika-vin10t:11779: Saṅgho vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na gaṇo na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t:11782: Gaṇo vāpajjatāpattiṃ, na saṅgho na ca puggalo.
tika-vin10t:11784: Suttuddesaṃ karonto vā, eko pana uposathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11785: Puggalopajjatāpattiṃ, na ca saṅgho gaṇo na ca.
tika-vin10t:11790: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:11793: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t:11796: Atthāpatti hi antova, na bahiddhā, tathā bahi;
tika-vin10t:11799: Anupakhajja seyyaṃ tu, kappento pana kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:11800: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, antoyeva ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t:11803: Bahiyeva ca, no anto, sesaṃ panubhayatthapi.
tika-vin10t:11858: Āpanno paṭibuddhova, sutto sujjhati so kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:11864: Desento pana taṃ ñatvā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11867: Samathe tu sayantova, sutto vuṭṭhāti nāma so.
tika-vin10t:11873: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, paṭibuddho visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11882: Pacchā taṃ pana desento, sacittova visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11897: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammena visujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11906: Desento pana taṃ pacchā, akammeneva sujjhati.
tika-vin10t:11915: Vuṭṭhānakāle saṅghena, kiñci kammaṃ na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:11924: Taṃ pacchā pana desento, visujjhati asammukhā.
tika-vin10t:11939: Atthāpatti ca sesaṃ tu, ubho nāpajjare pana.
tika-vin10t:11942: Vihāraṃ pavisanto ca, vicarantopi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t:11959: Samaṇo samaṇī kāya-saṃsaggaṃ tu karonti ce;
tika-vin10t:11963: Kāyassa pana saṃsaggo, ubhinnaṃ vatthu hoti hi.
tika-vin10t:11966: Āpajjati hi pācittiṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12004: Upajjhāyo phuse vajjaṃ, na ca saddhivihāriko.
tika-vin10t:12009: Sesaṃ panidha āpattiṃ, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t:12012: Ādiyanto garuṃ dosaṃ, payojento lahuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:12013: Ādiyanto lahuṃ dosaṃ, payojento garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:12018: Pādaṃ vāpi tato uddhaṃ, ādiyanto garuṃ phuse;
tika-vin10t:12024: Kāleyeva panāpatti, no vikāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t:12025: Vikāleyeva āpatti, na ca kāle kathaṃ siyā?
tika-vin10t:12027: Atthāpatti hi kāle ca, vikāle ca pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t:12028: Neva kāle vikāle ca, atthāpatti pakāsitā?
tika-vin10t:12034: Sesaṃ kāle vikāle ca, āpajjati, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:12039: Kiṃ paṭiggahitaṃ kāle, no vikāle tu kappati?
tika-vin10t:12040: Vikāle kiñca no kāle, gahitaṃ pana kappati?
tika-vin10t:12042: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kiṃ nāma vada kappati?
tika-vin10t:12043: Neva kāle ca kiṃ nāma, no vikāle ca kappati?
tika-vin10t:12046: Kāleyeva tu bhikkhūnaṃ, no vikāle tu kappati.
tika-vin10t:12049: Vikāleyeva kāle ca, aparajju na kappati.
tika-vin10t:12052: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, kappatīti viniddise.
tika-vin10t:12058: Kāle ceva vikāle ca, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:12061: Majjhime pana desasmiṃ, na ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t:12066: Sīmaṃ samudde bandhanto, bhikkhu paccantimesu hi;
tika-vin10t:12072: Dhārento majjhime vajjaṃ, phuse paccantimesu no;
tika-vin10t:12076: Paccantimesu vā bhikkhu, nāpajjati na majjhime.
tika-vin10t:12078: Paccantimesu desesu, kappate na ca majjhime;
tika-vin10t:12079: Kappate, majjhime dese, no ca paccantimesu hi.
tika-vin10t:12082: Paccantimesu cevāpi, kiṃ na kappati majjhime?
tika-vin10t:12085: Niddise kappatī ceva, na ca kappati majjhime.
tika-vin10t:12090: Paccantimesu desesu, evaṃ vuttaṃ na kappati;
tika-vin10t:12094: Ubhayatthapi taṃ sabbaṃ, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:12096: Anto āpajjatāpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi;
tika-vin10t:12097: Bahi āpajjatāpattiṃ, na ca anto kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12100: Neva anto ca āpattiṃ, āpajjati ca, no bahi.
tika-vin10t:12103: Saṅghikaṃ pana mañcādiṃ, ajjhokāse tu kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:12105: Nikkhipitvāna gacchanto, no anto, bahiyeva ca;
tika-vin10t:12111: Gāme āpajjatāpattiṃ, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12112: Āpajjati araññasmiṃ, na ca gāme kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12114: Āpajjati ca gāmepi, araññepi kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12115: Nevāpajjati gāmepi, no araññe kathaṃ vada?
tika-vin10t:12118: Āpajjati hi taṃ bhikkhu, gāmasmiṃ, no araññake.
tika-vin10t:12120: Agaṇā aruṇaṃ nāma, uṭṭhāpentī ca bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:12121: Āpajjati panāpattiṃ, araññe, no ca gāmake.
tika-vin10t:12127: Agilānova āpattiṃ, phuse, no ca gilānako.
tika-vin10t:12129: Agilāno gilāno ca, āpajjanti ubhopi ca;
tika-vin10t:12130: Nāpajjanti gilāno ca, agilāno ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t:12132: Bhesajjena panaññena, atthe sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:12135: Na bhesajjena atthepi, bhesajjaṃ viññāpeti ce;
tika-vin10t:12148: Yo tattha cīvaruppādo, so ca nesaṃ bhavissati;
tika-vin10t:12155: Gadrabhassa vasā ceti, vasā pañcavidhā matā.
tika-vin10t:12198: Āpattiṃ pana jānāti, anāpattiṃ garuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12207: Satta sāmīciyo vuttā, satteva samathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:12212: Pupphena ca phalenāpi, cuṇṇenapi ca dūsako.
tika-vin10t:12220: Kataṃ ahatthapāsepi, na ca bhuttāvinā kataṃ;
tika-vin10t:12233: Iti aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti, sabbameva ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12250: Musā na bhāse, na ca majjapo siyā;
tika-vin10t:12254: Mālaṃ na dhāre, na ca gandhamācare;
tika-vin10t:12264: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, nava maṃsāni khādato.
tika-vin10t:12271: Akappiyāni maṃsāni, dasa sukkāni ve dasa.
tika-vin10t:12273: Jāti nāmañca gottañca, kammaṃ sippañca rogatā;
tika-vin10t:12274: Liṅgāpatti kilesā ca, akkosena daseva hi.
tika-vin10t:12279: Dasa kammapathā puññā, apuññāpi tathā dasa;
tika-vin10t:12301: Pattā akappiyā vuttā, ekādasa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12314: Gaṇṭhikā kappiyā vuttā, ekādasa ca vīdhakā.
tika-vin10t:12325: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṃ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12338: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:12342: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ suṇataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:12346: Paṭicca methunaṃ dhammaṃ, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12349: Mukhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t:12351: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t:12354: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:12357: Sayaṃ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t:12364: Parassa tu parikkhāraṃ, na ca pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12367: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t:12369: Attano santakaṃ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12372: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t:12373: Hantvānantariyaṃ kammaṃ, na phuseyya kathaṃ naro?
tika-vin10t:12379: Gacchaṃ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12385: Kathaṃ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t:12391: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṃ, vattaṃ so vuṭṭhito kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12401: Vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṃ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t:12404: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:12407: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṃ ghasati bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12410: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12411: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:12414: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:12416: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12417: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12422: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:12423: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12428: Ekissā dve siyuṃ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t:12429: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12432: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:12438: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:12440: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṃ gato;
tika-vin10t:12441: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t:12444: Na so labhati aññesaṃ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:12447: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t:12450: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t:12455: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṃ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12456: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t:12469: Parassā pana yā vajjaṃ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:12477: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t:12480: Anuggiraṃ giraṃ kiñci, subhaṃ vā yadi vāsubhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12481: Phuse vācasikaṃ vajjaṃ, kathaṃ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12495: Saṃvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṃ theniṃsu bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12496: Thero thullaccayaṃ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12498: Kathaṃ? Chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t:12499: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:12506: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:12507: Chiddaṃ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t:12512: Sappiādiṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, gahetvā sāmameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:12519: Ekatova kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12521: Saṅghe pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t:12535: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṃ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t:12537: Kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṃ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:12540: Purisaṃ apitaraṃ hantvā, itthiṃ hantvā amātaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12543: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, pitaraṃ itthitaṃ gataṃ;
tika-vin10t:12544: Mātaraṃ purisattaṃ tu, gataṃ hantvā garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:12546: Mātaraṃ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t:12552: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṃ, saṅgho kammaṃ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t:12553: Kathaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ taṃ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12567: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṃ;
tika-vin10t:12582: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t:12589: Nānitthīnaṃ tu kese vā, tāsaṃ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t:12590: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t:12601: Methunaṃ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t:12606: Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṃ na ca;
tika-vin10t:12607: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t:12623: Ekassa kammaṃ tu na rūhate kiṃ?
tika-vin10t:12630: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t:12631: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṃ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t:12633: Na ca kappakataṃ vatthaṃ, na ca rattaṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12637: Na cassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:12639: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t:12640: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t:12658: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṃ, kathaṃ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12664: Dvijaṃ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12684: Nidānaṃ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12687: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t:12691: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t:12696: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t:12697: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:12703: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12714: Vosāsantī ca naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā cārikadvayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12727: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṃ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t:12739: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t:12742: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12747: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12748: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t:12753: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t:12754: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12757: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṃsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12759: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t:12762: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t:12765: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t:12766: Nissaggiyāni tiṃseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:12769: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12771: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12777: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t:12778: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t:12784: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12789: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṃ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t:12810: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12814: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t:12816: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t:12832: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12835: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t:12840: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṃ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t:12854: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12855: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t:12866: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t:12867: Sikkhāpadaṃ tu paññattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t:12873: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12875: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12878: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t:12903: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t:12908: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t:12917: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t:12934: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12945: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:12985: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12988: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:12989: Kati thullaccayaṃ maṃse, kati maṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12994: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13000: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13001: Abhirūhati nāvaṃ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:13004: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:13006: Kati vācasikā rattiṃ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t:13007: Duve vācasikā rattiṃ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t:13019: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t:13022: Manussassa visaṃ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t:13023: Hoti pārājikaṃ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:13026: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:13040: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t:13044: Ratticchedo katīnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t:13047: Ratticchedo duvinnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13050: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t:13061: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13064: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:13072: Pārājikaṃ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mate.
tika-vin10t:13084: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t:13087: Dvīhi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13093: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṃ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t:13095: Visaṃ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t:13096: Pārājikaṃ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:13101: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t:13107: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13114: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:13120: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t:13131: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t:13141: Gahetvā bhojanaṃ kiñci, sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13153: Olokentassa vā vuttaṃ, mukhaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t:13164: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t:13168: Dve tayo anusāvetuṃ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:13170: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t:13180: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t:13192: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:13194: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṃ tu, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:13197: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t:13198: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13213: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t:13223: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t:13224: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t:13235: Vāceti ca paraṃ niccaṃ, atthaṃ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t:13237: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t:13263: Rājā pātu mahiṃ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t:13265: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t:13277: Akāsiṃ paramaṃ etaṃ, uttaraṃ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t:13278: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13285: Iti tambapaṇṇiyena paramaveyyākaraṇena tipiṭakanayavidhikusalena paramakavijanahadayapadumavanavikasanakarena kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo samattoti.
